gi pa rasmai'i tshig la yon tan med pa nyid do/ /hi la ni/ hi la'ang ngo zhes pas so/ /uSh+TAM/ u shan+tu/ d+huT rnams kyi bzhi pa rnams la gsum pa'o/ /aD+D+hi/ uSh+TAta/ uSh+TaM/ uSh+Ta/ ba shA ni/ ba shA ba/ ba shA ma/ ha na/ han+tu/ han+ti'i d+huT la byings thams cad pa la'o zhes pas

d+huT dang po yon tan med pa la na yig dbyi'o/ /ha tAta/ ha tAM/ gam han zhes pa la sogs pas u pa d+hA'i a dbyi'o/ /u pa d+hA phyis pa'i'ang ngo zhes pas ha'i g+ha nyid do/ /g+h+nAn+tu/ han+ti'i hi la dza'o zhes pas dza ru bsgyur ro/ /a yig las han+ti ma yin pa las hi'i'o zhes bkag

pa las hi'i dbyi ba med do/ /ja hi/ pha rol nyid las hi snang dgos pa nyid kyi phyir tA taN gnas can bzhin mi 'gyur ba las kyang dza ru mi bsgyur ro/ /ha tAta/ ha taM/ ha ta/ ha nA ni/ ha nA ba/ ha nA ma/ Ang las gam dang han dag rang gi yan lag gi las can dag kyang ngo zhes

pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /thams cad kyi byings thams cad pa At+ma ne la pany+tsa mI'i phyi ma ma yin pa la'o zhes pas yon tan med pa nyid do/ /pany+tsa mI'i phyi ma ma yin zhes spangs pa nyid kyi phyir skyes bu phyi ma'i ni ma yin no/ /A ha tAM/ A

g+h+nA trAM/ a yig ma yin pa las Any+ma ne la'ang ngo zhes pas an+ti'i na dbyi'o/ /Ag+h+nA tAM/ a hA swa/ Ag+h+nA thAM/ A ha d+h+waM/ A ha ni/ A ha nA ba hai/ A ha nA ma hai/ d+h+yu/ gsal byed dang po yon tan can byings thams cad pa la uta'i 'phel ba'o/ /d+yau tu/ d+yu tAta/ d+yu tAM/ dbyangs

dang po yon tan med pa la u pa'o/ /d+h+yu ban+tu/ d+yu hi/ d+yu tAta/ d+yu taM/ d+yu ta/ nA mi mtha'i yon tan no/ /o a ba'o/ /d+ya bA ni/ d+ya bA ba/ d+ya bA ma/ de bzhin du su la sogs pa'o/ /i ka / a d+h+ye tu/ a d+hI tAta/ a d+hI tAM/ snga ma bzhin du ya nyid do/ /a d+hI yan+tu/ a d+hI hi/ a d+hI tAta/

a d+hI taM/ a d+hI ta/ e a ya'o/ /a d+h+ya yA ni/ a d+h+ya yA ba/ a d+h+ya yAm/ i Na/ i tu/ i tAta/ i tAM/ yan+tu/ i ti/ i tAta/ i taM/ i ta/ a yA ni/ a yA ba/ a yA ma/ bI rab tu skye ba la'o/ /be tu/ bI tAta/ bI tAM/ dbyangs dang po yon tan med

pa la i ya'o/ /bi yan+tu/ bI hi/ bI tAta/ bI tAM/ bI ta/ bA yA ni/ ba yA ba/ ba yA ma/ b+hA/ b+hA tu/ b+hA tAta/ b+hA tAM/ ring po las pha rol dbyi'o/ /b+hAn+tu/ b+hA hi/ b+hA tAta/ b+hA taM/ b+hA ta/ b+hA ni/ b+hA pa/ b+hA ma/ pra b+hA Ni/ de bzhin du yA sogs pa rnams kyi'o/ /bid shes pa la'o/ /nA mi

u pa d+hA'i yon tan no/ /bet+tu/ bet+tAta/ bit+tAM/ bidan+tu/ bi d+hi/ bit+dAta/ bit+taM/ bit+ta/ be dA ni/ be dA ba/ be dA ma/ de la bid las pany+tsa mI la'ang A ma'i kr-inya rjes su'o zhes pa'i tshig las phyogs gcig la Ama'o/ /Am mtha'i kr-inya rjes su sbyar ro/ /Am la'ang bid nyid kyi'o zhes pa'i

tshig las yon tan med pa nyid do/ /tan sogs las u'o/ /ka ro ti'i'o zhes pas yon tan no/ /bi ka ra Na'i ni nA mI'i mtha' mtshon pa las yon tan no/ /ma gsal byed la rjes su nga ro'o zhes pas ma'i rjes su nga ro'o/ /bi dAM ka ro tu/ byings thams cad pa yon tan med pa la a'i

u yig go/ /bi dAM ku ru tAta/ bi dAM ku ru tAM/ u'i yi ge wa'o/ /bi dAM kurban+tu/ u yig las kyang ngo zhes pas u yig bo kar ca las hi dbyi'o/ /tA taNa'i gnas can bzhin mi 'gyur pa la hi gsal ba nyid las/ bi dAM ku ru/ bi dAM ku ru tAta/ bi dAM ku ru taM/ bi dAM ku ru ta/ ra

Sha r-i'i yi ge rnams las zhes pa la sogs pas Na nyid do/ /bi dAM ka ra bA Ni/ bi dAM ka ra bA ba/ bi dAM ka ra bA ma/ gang gi tshe sde pa la de'i sde pa'i lnga par yang na'o zhes pas rjes su nga ro'i de'i sde pa'i lnga pa nga yin pa de'i tshe bi dAM ka ro tu zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /sam las gam mi zhes pa la

sogs pas las can gyi ni ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /saM bit+tAM/ saM bi dA tAM/ de la bet+ti'i yang na brjod par bya ba la ir te an+ti'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /saM bi da tAM/ saM bi da taM/ saM bit+s+wa/ saM bi dA thAM/ saM bi d+h+waM/ saM bi dai/ saM bi dA ba hai/ saM bi dA ma hai/ phyogs

gcig la snga ma bzhin A ma la sogs pa'o/ /saM bi dAM ku ru tAM/ saM bi dAM ku run+ta/ saM bi dAM kurba tAM/ saM bi dAM ku ru Sha/ saM bi dAM kurbA thAM/ saM bi dAM ku ru d+h+waM/ saM bi dAM ka ra bai/ saM bi dAM ka ra bA ba hai/ saM bi dAM ka ra bA ma hai/ rjes su nga ro'i de'i sde pa'i lnga pa la nga yig go/ /saM bi dAng+ku ru tAM/ zhes pa la

sogs pa'o/ /as yod pa la'o/ /astu/ /asti'i dang po'i'o zhes pas yon tan med pa la a yig dbyi'o/ /stAta/ stAM/ san+tu/ dA asti dag gi e ste a b+h+yAs dbyi'o zhes pas e nyid do/ /a sti las so zhes pas hi'i d+hi'o/ /tA ta Na'i ni gnas can bzhin mi 'gyur ba yis

kyang hi snang dgos pa nyid las e nyid gnyis su mi 'gyur ro/ /e d+hi/ stAta/ staM/ sta/ a sA ni/ a sA ba/ a sA ma/ mr-i dzU/ mAn+Du/ mr-iSh+TAta/ mr-iSh+D+DaM/ mArdzan+tu/ mr-i dzan+tu/ mr-iD+D+hi/ mr-iSh+DAta/ mriSh+TaM/ mr-iSh+Ta/ nArdzA ni/ mr-irdzA ba/ mr-i dzA ma/ ba tsa/ bak+tu/ bak+tAta/ bak+tAM/ ba tsan+tu/ d+huT rnams

kyi bzhi pa rnams la gsum pa'o zhes pas ka'i g+ha'o/ /bag d+hi/ bag+tAta/ bag+taM/ bag+ta/ ba tsA ni/ ba tsA ba/ ba tsA ma/ ru dir/ ro di tu/ ru di tAta/ ru di tAM/ ru dan+tu/ pha rol nyid las iT A ga ma'o/ /de la iT med ces pa rjes su 'jug ste iT med dang bcas pa'i hi'i ni/ ru d+hi/

ru di tAta/ ru di taM/ ru dita/ ro dA ni/ ro dA ba/ ro dA ma/ de bzhin du/ nyi Sh+wa pa/ shwa sa/ an yang ngo zhes pa de rnams kyi de la/ yang smos pa las an+ti'i mtha'i yang zhes pas Na nyid do/ /prA Ni tu/ swa pi tu/ sho bi tu/ dzak+Sha/ dzak+Shi tu/ dzak+Sha tAta/ dzak+Shi tAM/ a b+h+yasta

las an+ti'i na dbyi'o/ /dzak+Sha tu/ dzA gr-i/ dzA gar+t+tu/ dzA gr-i tAta/ dzA gr-i tAM/ dzA gra tu/ dzA gr-i hi/ dzA gr-i tAta/ dzA gr-i taM/ dzA gr-i ta/ dzA ga rA Ni/ dzA ga rA ba/ dzA ga rA ma/ da ri drA/ da ri drA tu/ da ri dri tAta/ da ri dri tAM/ da ri dra tu/ da ri drA hi/ da ri drI tAta/ da ri dri taM/ da ri dri ta/ da ri drA Ni/ da ri

drA ba/ da ri drA ma/ tsa kA sr-i/ tsa kAstu/ tsa kAstAta/ tsa kAstAM/ tsa kA sa tu/ d+huT rnams kyi bzhi pa rnams la gsum pa'o zhes pas sa'i da'o/ /tsa kA d+hi/ tsa kAstAta/ tsa kAstaM/ tsa kAsta/ tsa kA sA ni/ tsa kA sA ba/ tsa kA sA ma/ shA su/ shAstu/ shiSh+TAta/ shiSh+TAm/ shA sa tu/ shAsti las kyang ngo

zhes pas hi'i d+hi'o/ /shA sti'ang shA ru 'gyur ro/ /shA d+hi/ shiSh+TAta/ shiSh+TAM/ shiSh+Ta/ shA sA ni/ shA sA ba/ shA sA ma/ tsa k+Shing / A tsaSh+TAM/ A tsak+ShA tAM/ A tsak+Sha tAM/ I ra/ Ir+t+tAM/ I rA tAM/ I ra tAM/ I Da/ IT+TaM/ I DA tAM/ I Ta dzan dag gi sa dang d+h+wa la'ang ngo zhes pas iT

A ga ma'o/ /I Di Sh+wa/ I DA thAM/ I Di d+h+waM/ I sha// ISh+DAM/ I shA tAM/ I shA tAM/ I sha las sa la'o zhes pas iT A ga ma'o/ /I shI Sh+wa/ I shA thAM/ IT dzan dag gi sa dang d+h+wa la'ang ngo zhes pas iT A ga ma'o/ /I shi d+h+waM/ A sa/ AstAM/ A sA tAM/ A sa tAM/ As+s+Na/ A

sA thAM/ A sa'i gsum pa da'o/ /A d+h+wi/ Ang las shA su/ A shAstAM/ A shA sA tAM/ A shA sa tAM/ ba sa kun du 'gebs pa la'o/ /bstAM/ ba sA tAM/ ba sa tAM/ ShUng srog chags mngal nas skye ba la'o/ /sU tAM/ su bA tAM/ su ba taM/ sU Sh+wa/ su bA thA/ sU d+h+waM/ sU d+hi las pany+tsa mI la'o

zhes pas yon tan med pa nyid do/ /su bai/ su bA ba hai/ su bA ma hai/ shIng shIng byings thams cad pa la'o zhes pas yon tan no/ /she tAM/ sha yA tAM/ she ti las an+ti'i dang po i ra'o/ /she ra tAM/ she Sh+wa/ sha yA thAM/ she d+h+waM/ nA mi mtha'i yon tan no/ /she yai/ sha yA ba hai/ sha yA

ma hai/ ing / a d+hI tAM/ a d+hI yA tAM/ a d+hi yA tAM/ a d+hi Sh+wa/ a d+hi yA thAM/ a d+hI d+h+waM/ a d+h+yai/ a d+h+yA ba hai/ a d+h+yA ma hai/ dI d+hIng / be bIng / dI d+hI be bI dag gi 'ang ngo zhes pas bany+tsa mI'i phyi ma spangs pa la yon tan med do/ /A dI d+hi tAM/ A dI d+h+yA tAM/ a dI d+h+ya tAM/ a dI d+hI Sh+wa/ a dA

d+h+yAM thAM/ a dI d+hI d+h+waM/ a dI d+h+yai/ A dI d+h+yA ba hai/ A dI d+h+yA ma hai/ A be bI tAM/ A be byA tAM/ A be byA tAM/ A be bI Sh+wa/ A be byA thAM/ A be bI d+h+waM/ A be byai/ A be byA ba hai/ A be byA ma hai/ h+nung / h+nu tAM/ dbyangs dang po yon tan med pa la u ba'o/ /h+nu bA tAM/ h+nu ba tAM/ h+nu Sh+wa/ h+nu bA thAM/ h+nu

d+h+wa/ yon tan no/ /o a ba'o/ /h+na bai h+na bA ba hai/ h+na bA ma hai/ dwiSha/ dwiSh+Tu/ dwiSh+TAta/ dwiSh+TaM/ dwi Shan+tu/ Sha'i gsum pa Da'o/ /dwiD+D+hi/ dwiSh+TAta/ dwiSh+TaM/ dwiSh+Ta/ dweShA Ni/ dwe ShA ba/ dwe ShA ma/ dwi Sh+TAM/ dwi ShA tAM/ dwi Sha tAM/ dwi k+Sha/ dwi ShA thAM/ dwiD+D+h+waM/ dwe shai/ dwe ShA ba hai/ dwe Sh+'a ma hai/ du ha/

dog+d+hu/ dug+d+hAta/ dug+d+hAM/ du han du/ dug+d+hi/ dug+d+hAta/ dug+d+haM/ dug+ha/ do hA ni/ do hA ba/ do hA ma/ du g+hAM/ du hA tAM/ du ha tAM/ d+huk+Sha/ du hA thAM/ dug+d+h+waM/ do hai/ do hA ba hai/ do hA ma hai/ di ha/ deg+d+hu/ dig+d+hAta/ dig+d+hAM/ di han+tu/ di g+d+hi/ dig+d+hIta/ dig+d+haM/ dig+d+haM/ de hA ni/ de hA ba/ de hA ma/ dig+d+hAM/ di hA tAM/

di ha tAM/ dik+Sh+wa/ di hA thAM/ di g+d+h+waM/ de ho/ de hI ba hai/ de hwa ma tai/ li ha/ li g+d+hu/ li g+d+ha' ta/ li g+d+dI/ li han+tu/ li g+d+hi/ li g+d+hata/ li g+d+haM/ li g+d+ha/ le hA ni/ le hA pa/ le hA ma/ li g+d+hAM/ li hA tAM/ li hi tAM/ li k+Sha/ li hA thAM/ li d+h+waM/ le hai/ le hA ba he/ le hA ma hai/ U r+N+Nu nya/ U r+N+Nu ti'i yon tan

no zhes pa gsal byed dang po yon tan can la yang yon tan no/ /phyogs gcig la u ta'i 'phel ba'o/ /Ur+N+No tu/ Ur+N+Nau tu/ Ur+N+Nu tAta/ Ur+N+Nu taM/ Ur+N+Nu ban+tu/ Ur+N+Nu hi/ Ur+N+Nu tAta/ Ur+N+Na taM/ Ur+N+Na ta/ Ur+N+Na bA ni/ Ur+N+Na bA ba/ Ur+N+Nu bA ma/ Ur+N+Nu bA tAM/ Ur+N+Nu ba tAM/ Ur+N+NUb tAM/ Ur+N+Na Sh+wa/

Ur+N+Nu bA thAM/ Ur+N+Nu d+h+waM/ Ur+N+Na bai/ Ur+N+Na bA ba hai/ Ur+N+Na bA ma hai/ Sh+Tunya/ stau tu/ stu tAta/ stu tAM/ stu ban+tu/ stu hi/ stu tAta/ stu taM/ tu ta/ sta bA ni/ stu bA ba/ stu bA ma/ stu tAM/ stu bA tAM/ stu ba tAM/ stu Sh+wa/ stu bA thAM/ stu d+h+waM/ sta bai/ sta bA ba hai/ sta bA ma hai/ brunya/ gsal byed dang po

yon tan can la bru las ngag dang por ITa'o/ /bra bI tu/ brU tAta/ brU tAM/ brU ban+tu/ brU hi/ brU tAta/ brU taM/ brU ta/ bra bA ni/ bru bA ba/ bru bA ma/ brU tAM/ brU bA tAM/ brU ba tAM/ brU Sh+wa/ brU bA thAM/ brU d+h+'+waM/ bra bai/ bra bA bahe/ bra bA ma hai/ hu/ dzu ho tu/ dzu hu tAta/ dzu

hu tAM/ a b+h+ya sta las an+ti'i na dbyi'o/ /dzu hwa tu/ hu d+huT dag las hi'i d+hi'o zhes pas hi'i d+hi'o/ /dzu hu d+hi/ dzu hu tAta/ dzu hu taM/ dzu hu ta/ dzu hu bA ni/ dzu hu bA ba/ dzu hu bA ma/ nyi b+hI/ be b+he tu/ bi b+hi tAta/ bi b+hI tAta/ bi b+hi tAM/ bi b+hI tAM/ bi b+h+ya tu/ bi b+hi hi/ bi b+hI hi/ bi b+hi tAta/ bi b+hI tAta/

bi b+hi taM/ bi b+hA taM/ bi b+hi ta/ bi b+hI ta/ bi b+ha yA ni/ bi b+ha yA ba/ bi b+ha yA ma/ hrI/ dzi hre tu/ dzi hrI tAta/ dzi hI tAM/ dzi hri ya tu/ dzi hrI hi/ dzi hrI tA ta/ dzi hrI tAM/ dzi hri ta/ dzi hra yA ni/ dzi hra yA ba/ dzihra yA ma/ pr-i/ pi partu/ pi pr-i tAta/ pi pr-i tAM/ pi pr-i tu/ pi pr-i hi/ pi pr-i tAta/ pi pr-i

tAM/ pi pr-i ta/ pi pa rA Ni/ pi pa rA ba/ pi pa rA ma/ o hA ka /dza hA tu/ dza hi tAta/ dza hI tAta/ dza hi tAM/ dza hI tAM/ dza ha tu/ hi la'ang A nyid dang i nyid dang I nyid bshad do/ /dza hA hi/ dza hi hi/ dza hI hi/ r-i sr-i/ i yartu/ i y+r-i tAta/ i y+r-i tAM/ i y+ra tu/ sa sartu/ sa sr-i tAta/

sa sr-i tAM/ sa sra tu/ ki dang kita/ ka sde'i tsa sde'o/ /tse ke tu/ tsi ki tAta/ tsi ki tAM/ tsi kya tu/ tsi ki hi/ tsi ka tAta/ tsi ki tAM/ tsi ki ta/ tsi ki yA ni/ tsi ki yA ba/ tsi ki yA ma/ tu ra mgyogs pa la'o/ /gnyis brjod do/ /a b+h+ya sa'i gsal byed dang po lhag mar bya'o/ /nA mi na 'ir

ba dag ces pa la sogs pas ring po'o/ /tu tUr+t+tu/ tu tUr+t+tAta/ tu tUr+t+tAM/ tu tu ra tu/ tu tUr+d+hi/ tsi ket+tu/ tsi kit+tAMta/ tsi kit+tAM/ tsi ki t+tu/ tsi kiD+D+hi/ tsi ki t+tAta/ tsi kit+taM/ tsikit+ta/ a b+h+ya sta'i yang u pa d+hA na min byings thams cad pa yon tan can la dbyangs la'o zhes pas yon tan bkag go/ /

tsi ki tI ni/ tsi ki tA ba/ tsi ki tA ma/ dza dza na/ dza dzA tu/ dza dzA tAta/ dza dzA tAM/ dza dz+nya tu/ dza dzA hi/ dza dzA tAta/ dza dzA taM/ dza dzA ta/ a b+h+yasta'i yang u pa d+hA zhes pa la sogs pa khyad par nA mi gzung ba las nA mi'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyis yon tan nyid du mi 'gyur ba la/ gam han zhes pa la sogs pas u pa

d+hA dbyi ba med do/ /dza nA ni/ dza dza nA ba/ dza dza nA ma/ nges pa med pa la'ang A ga ti zhes pa la sogs pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /bya ti dza dzA tAM/ bya ti dza dz+nyA tAM/ bya ti dza dz+nyA tAM/ iT dzan dag gis dang d+h+wa la'ang ngo zhes pas iT A ga ma'o/ /bya ti dza dz+nyi Sh+wa/ bya ti dza dz+nyA thaM/

bya ti dza dz+nyi d+h+waM/ bya ti dza dza ni/ bya ti dza dza nA ba hai/ bya ti dza dza nA ma hai/ Ni dzir/ ne nek+tu/ ne nik+tAta/ ne nik+t+waM/ ne ni dzan+tu/ ne nig+d+hi/ ne nik+tAta/ ne nik+taM/ ne nik+ta/ a b+h+ya sta'i yang u pa d+hA zhes pa la sogs pas yon tan bkag go/ /ne ni dzA ni/ ne ni dzA ba/ ne ni dzA ma/ ne nik+tAM/ ne ni dzA tAM/ ne ni dza tAM/

ne nik+Sh+wa/ ne ni dzA thAM/ ne ni g+d+h+waM/ ne ni dzai/ ne ni dzA ba hai/ ne ni dzA ma hai/ de bzhin du bi dzir/ be bik+tu/ be bik+tAta/ be bik+tAM/ be bi dza tu/ be bik+d+hi/ be bik+tAta/ be bik+tAM/ be bik+ta/ be bi dzA ni/ be bi dzA ba/ be bi dzA ma/ be sh+l-i/ be biSh+Tu/ be biSh+TAta/ be biSh+TAM/ be bi Sha tu/ be biD+D+hi/ be biT+Tata/ be

biSh+TaM/ be biSh+Ta/ be bi ShA Ni/ be bi ShA ba/ be bi ShA ma/ be bi Sha TAM/ be bi ShA tAM/ be bi Sha tAM/ be bi Sh+wa/ be bi Sha thAM/ be bi d+h+waM/ be bi Shai/ be bi ShA ba hai/ be bi ShA ma hai/ Du dA nya/ da dA tu/ a b+h+yasta rnams kyi A yig go zhes pas yon tan med pa la A yig dbyi'o/ /sgra med pa

rnams la shiT ma yin pa rnams kyi dang po'o/ /dat+tAta/ dat+tAM/ da da tu/ dA asti dag gi i ste a b+h+yas dbyi ba'ang ngo zhes pas mtha'i e nyid de a b+h+ya sa dbyi'o/ /de hi/ dat+tAta/ dat+taM/ dat+ta/ da dA ni/ da dA ba/ da dA ma/ dat+tAM/ da dA tAM/ da da tAM/ dat+s+wa/ da dA thAM/ da d+h+waM/ mtshams sbyor

gyi yi ge la yang ngo zhes pas A yig dbye'o/ /da dai/ ring po las pha rol dbyi'o/ /da dA ba hai/ da dA ma hai/ Du d+hAnya/ Du b+h+r-inya/ da d+hI tu/ da d+hA ti'i ta thA dag la'ang ngo zhes pas d+hA'i mtha'i dang po de'i bzhi pa d+ha nyid do/ /d+hat+tAta/ d+hat+tAM/ da d+ha tu/ d+he hi/ d+hat+tAta/ d+hat+taM/ d+hat+ta/ da d+hA ni/

da d+hA ba/ da d+hA ma/ d+hat+taM/ da d+hA tAM/ da d+ha taM/ d+hat+s+wa/ da d+hA thAM/ d+ha d+h+waM/ d+ha d+hai/ da d+hA ba hai/ da d+hA ma hai/ bi da d+hA tu/ bi d+hat+tAta/ bi d+hat+tAM/ bi da d+ha tu/ b+h+r-inya hAng mAng rnams kyi i ta'o/ /bi b+hartu/ b+h+r-i tAta/ bi b+h+r-i tAM/ bi b+ha tu/ bi b+h+r-i hi/ bi b+h+r-i tAta/ bi b+h+r-i taM/ bi b+h+r-i ta/ bi b+h+rA Ni/

bi b+h+rA ba/ bi b+hA ma/ bi b+h+r-I tAM/ bi b+h+rA tAM/ bi b+h+r-I Sh+wa/ bi b+h+rA thAM/ bi b+h+r-I d+h+waM/ bi b+ha rai/ ba b+ha rA ba hai/ ba b+ha rA ma hai/ mAng tshad la ste sgra la'o/ /gnyi ga rnams kyi dA ma yin pa'i gsal byed dang po la I yig go/ /mi mI tAM/ snga ma bzhin I yig dbyi'o/ /mi mA tAM/

mi ma tAM/ mi mI Sh+wa/ mi mA thAM/ mi mI d+h+waM/ mi mi d+h+waM/ mi mai/ mi mA ba hai/ mi mA ma hai/ o hAng / dzi hI tAM/ dzi hA tAM/ dzi ha tAM/ dzi hi tAM/ di bu/ dI bya tu/ di bya tAta/ dI bya tAM/ di byan+tu/ a yig las han+ti ma yin pa la hi'i'o zhes pas hi'i dbyi'o/ /dI bya/ dI bya tAta/ dI bya taM/ dA bya tAM/ dA bya

ta/ dI byA ni/ dI byA ba/ dA byA ma/ ShUng srog chags rab tu skye ba la'o/ /sU ya tAM/ sU ye tAM/ sU yan+tAM/ sU ya swa/ sU ye thAM/ sU ye d+h+waM/ sU yai/ sU yA ba hai/ sU yA ma hai/ Shu nya/ su no tu/ su nu tAta/ su nu tAM/ sun+wan+tu/ nu las kyang brtsegs pa ma yin pa'i bi ka ra Na las so zhes pas

hi'i dbyi'o/ /hi la'ang ngo zhes pas dang po nyid nas yon tan med pa nyid do/ /hi dbyi ba la yang na rkyen dbyi ba mtshan nyid kyis so/ /su nu/ su nu tAta/ su nu tAM/ su nu ta/ su nu bA ni/ su n+wA ba/ su n+wA ma/ su nu tAM/ su n+wA tAM/ su n+wa taM/ su nu Sh+wa/ su n+wA thAM/ su nu d+h+waM/ su n+wai/ su n+wA ba hai/

sun+wA ma hai/ br-inya/ br-i No tu/ br-i Nu tAta/ br-i Nu tAM/ bri N+wan+tu/ bri Nu/ br-i Nu tAta/ bri Nu taM/ br-i Nu ta/ bri Nu tAM/ bri NA tAM/ bri N+wa tAM/ A ph+li/ A p+no tu/ A p+nu tAta/ A p+nu tAM/ A p+nu ban+tu/ brtsegs pa ma yin pa'i zhes bkag pa las/ nu las kyang brtsegs pa ma yin pa'i bi ka ra Na las so zhes

pas hi dbyi ba med do/ /A p+nu hi/ tud/ tu da tu/ tu da tAta/ tu da tAM/ tu dan+tu/ tu da/ mtshungs pa'i ring po la sogs pa ni nang gi yan lag nyid las snga ma nyid do/ /tuta sogs kyi an la'o zhes pas yon tan med pa nyid do/ /dbyangs bsgyur ba gnas can bzhin 'gyur ba yis yang na

ru d+hir/ ruN d+hu/ run+d+hAta/ run+d+haM/ run+d+han+du/ ruN+d+hi/ ruN+d+hAta/ ruN+d+haM/ ruN+d+ha/ ru Na d+hA Ni/ run+d+hA ba/ run+d+hA ma/ run+d+hAM/ run+d+hA tAM/ run+d+ha tAM/ run+t+s+wa/ run+d+hA thAM/ run+d+h+waM/ ruN+d+ha \u0f7b/ ru Na d+hA ba hai/ ru Na d+hA ma hai/ b+hi di ra/ b+hi nat+tu/ b+hin+tata/ b+hin+dan+tu/ b+hin+h+hI/ b+hin+t+tAta/ b+hin+t+t+ta/ b+hin+tA ni/ b+hin+tA ba/ b+hin+tA ma/

b+hin+t+tAM/ b+hin+dA tAM/ b+hin+da taM/ b+hin+da taM/ b+hin+t+sa/ b+hin+dA thAM/ b+hin+d+haM/ b+hi na de/ b+hi na dA ba hai/ b+hi na dA ma hai/ tsha dir/ tshi nat+tu/ tshin+nata/ tshin+tAM/ tshin+tA/ tshin+dan+tu/ pi Sh+l-i/ pi naSh+Tu/ piSh+TAta/ piSh+TAM/ pi Shan+tu/ piD+D+hi/ piSh+TiMta/ piSh+TaM/ piSh+TaM/ pi ShAM/ pi Sha Ni/ pi ShA ba/ pi ShA ma/ b+hu dza/ b+hu nak+tu/

b+huM k+tAta/ b+huM k+tAM/ b+huM dzan+tu/ b+huM g+d+hi/ b+huM k+tAta/ b+huM k+taM/ b+huM k+ta/ b+hu na dzA ni/ b+huM dzA ba/ b+huM dzA ma/ b+hu dza'i zas la'o zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /b+huM k+tAM/ b+huM dzA tAM/ b+huM dzA tAM/ b+huM k+Sh+wa/ b+huM dzA thAM/ b+huM g+d+h+waM/ b+hu na dzai/ b+hu na dzA ba hai/ b+hu na dzA ma hai/ tr-i ha/ hi sa/ tr-i NAn+hu/ tr-iN+D+hata/ /

tr-i N+D+haM/ tr-i N+D+han+tu/ tr-i N+D+hi/ tr-i N+Da/ tr-i Na hA ni/ tr-iM hA ba/ tr-iM hA ma/ hi nastu/ hiM stAta/ hiM stAM/ hiM san+tu/ ta nu/ tan sogs las u'o/ /ta no tu/ tA nu tAta/ ta nu tAM/ ta n+wan+tu/ u yig las kyang ngo zhes pas hi'i dbyi'o/ /ta nu/ ta nu tAta/ ta nu taM/ ta nu ta/ ta na bI na/ ta

n+wA ma/ ta nu taM/ /ta n+wA na tAM/ ta n+wa tAM/ ta nu Sh+wa/ ta n+wA thAM/ ta nu d+h+waM/ ta na bai/ ta na bA ba hai/ ta na bA ma hai/ Du kr-inya/ ka ro tu/ ku ru tAta/ ku ru tA/ ku ru tAM/ kurban+tu/ ku ru/ ku ru tAta/ ku ru taM/ ku ru ta/ ka ra bA ni/ kurbA ba/ kurbA ma/ kur ru tAM/ kurbA tAM/ kurbA tAM/ kur ru Sh+wa/ kurbA thAM/

ku ru d+h+waM/ kar bai/ ka ra bA ba hai/ ka ra bA ma hai/ Du kr-Inya/ kr-I Na tu/ kr-I NI tAta/ kr-I NI tAM/ kr-I Nan+tu/ k+'+ri NI hi/ krI NI tAta/ krI NI taM/ krI NI ta/ krI NA ni/ krI NA ba/ krI NA ma/ krI NI tAM/ krI NA tAM/ krI Na tAM/ krI NISh+wa/ kri NI thAM/ kri NI d+h+waM/ e yig la ai ste/ ai yig la'ang ngo / /pha rol yang dbyi'o/ /

krI nai/ krI Na ba hai/ krI Na ma hai/ pUnya/ pu NA tu/ pu NI tAta/ pu NI tAM/ pu nan+tu/ pu nI tAM/ pu nA tAM/ pu na tAM/ lUnya/ lu nA tu/ lu nA tAta/ lu nI tAM/ lu nan+tu/ lu nI tAM/ lu nA tAM/ lu na tAM/ gra ha/ gr-i han+tu/ gr-i h+NI tAta/ gr-i h+NI tAM/ gr-i h+Nan+tu/ gsal byed mtha' las hi la A na'o zhes

pa'i shes par byed pa las kr-I sogs gsal byed kyi mtha' las An bi ka ra Na pha rol du 'gyur te he pha rol la'o/ /a yig las han+ti ma yin pa la hi'i'o zhes pas hi'i dbyi'o/ /gr-i hAN/ gr-i h+NI tAta/ gr-i h+NI taM/ gr-i h+NI ta/ gr-ih+NA na/ gr-i h+nA pa/ gr-i h+NA ma/ gr-i h+NI tAM/ gr-i h+NA tAM/ gr-i h+Na tAM/

ban+d+ha/ a nu ShaM ga dbyi'o/ /bA d+nA tu/ ba d+hA na/ pu Sha/ puSh+NA tu/ mu ShA Na/ muSha/ muSh+NA tu/ mu ShA Na/ man+tha/ ma th+nA tu/ ma thA na/ gran tha/ gra tha nA tu/ gra thA na/ ku Sha/ kuSh+NA tu/ kuShA Na/ stan+b+hu/ stun+b+hu/ skan+b+hu/ skan+bu/ sku rnams las nu'ang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o

zhes pas hi pha rol la stan+b+hu la sogs pa rnams las nu A ga ma zhes pa ste 'di dag bi ka ra Na dag go/ /skan+b+hu hi/ sta b+ha na/ de bzhin du stun+b+hu la sogs pa las so/ /tsu ra in gyi rkyen la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /tso ra ya tu/ tso ra ya tA ta/ tso ra ya tAM/ tso ra yan+tu/ tso ra ya/ tso ra

ya tA ta/ tsor ya taM/ tso ra ya ta/ tso ra yA Ni/ tso ra yA ba/ tso ra yA ma/ ma tri/ man+ta ya tAM/ man+t+ra ye tAM/ man+t+ra ya tAM/ man+t+ra ya swa/ man+t+ra ye thAM/ man+t+ra ya d+h+waM/ man+t+ra yai/ man+t+ra yA ba hai/ man+t+ra yA ma hai/ ni man+t+ra ye tAM/ ni man+t+ra ye tAM/ dngos po dang las la'ang At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /b+hA/ b+hA ya tAM/

dz+nyA/ dz+nyA ya tAM/ Du dAnya/ dI ya tAM/ dzi/ dzI ya tAM/ NI/ nI ya tAM/ shru/ shrU ya tAM/ b+hU/ b+hU ya tAM/ a b+hi b+hU ya tAM/ Du kri nya/ kri yA tAM/ smr-i/ sma r+Ya tAM/ tr-I/ tr-I r+Ya tAM/ pr-I/ pU r+Ya tAM/ gra ha/ gra h+ya ya taM/ nyi Sh+wa ba/ su s+ya tAM/ dza pa/ dza pya taM/ ku ra sgra la'o/ /nA mi na'i ra ba dag ces pa la sogs

pas ring po'o/ /kU r+Ya tAM/ kur tshur dag gi ma yin zhes pa ci zhe na/ ga ro ti'i dgag pa nye bar bstan pa nyid las so/ /ku ra snga ma bzhin in gyi rkyen la sogs pa'o/ /tso r+Ya tAM/ tsiti/ tsin+d+ya tAM/ ni man+t+ya tAM/ A man+t+ya tAM zhes pa mkhan pos sarba d+ha ras bkod pa'i ti la sogs pa'i mtha'i bya ba las

pany+tsa mI mdor bstan pa'o// //dpal ngag gi dbang phyug rig 'dzin sgrol ma dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ni h+ya sta nI'o/ /byung ba'i byed pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang ngo zhes pa 'das pa'i dus la 'jug bzhin pa'i byings las h+yasta nI'o/ /byung ba'i dus te byed pa la de rig par bya'o/ /

gang rnams kyi byung ba'i byed pa dang ldan pa'i lhag ma yin pa'i phyir h+yasta nI/ a t+ya ta nI/ bya ba shor bar grags pa nyid rnams so/ /de rnams kyi rang ming rnams kyis dus kyi khyad par ro zhes pas khar sang 'das pa'i dus la h+yasta nI'o/ /dzi/ snga ma bzhin skyes bu dang po la sogs pa rnams te/ gcig

gi don la gcig gi tshig di/ gnyis dag gi don la gnyis kyi tshig tAm/ mang po'i don rnams la mang po'i tshig ana'o/ /skyes bu dbus ma la gcig gi don la gcig gi tshig si/ gnyis dag gi don la gnyis kyi tshig tam/ mang po'i don rnams la mang po'i tshig ta'o/ /skyes bu

phyi ma la yang gcig gi don la gcig gi tshig am/ gnyis dag gi don la gnyis kyi tshig ba/ mang po'i don rnams la mang po'i tshig ma'o/ /de si dag gi i yig ni/ gsal byed las di si dag gi'o zhes pa'i khyad par gyi don no/ /byings kyi dang por h+yasta nI a t+ya ta ni bya ba shor ba

rnams la aTa'o zhes pas byings kyi dang por aT A ga ma'o/ /Ta yig nges par bstan pa'i don aT gzhan la yang ngo zhes pa'i khyad par gyi don no/ /snga ma bzhin an bi ka ra Na la sogs pa'o/ /rdzogs pa la yang na'o zhes pa'i da yig gi dang po ta yig dang gsum pa da yig go/ /

a dza yata/ a dza yad/ a dza ya tAM/ a dza yan/ a dza yaH/ a dza ya tAM/ a dza ya ta/ a dza yaM/ a dza yA ba/ a dza yA ma/ bi dang ba rA dag las dzi'o zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /snga ma bzhin skyes bu dang po la sogs pa rnams te/ gcig gi don

la gcig gi tshig ta/ gnyis dag gi don la gnyis kyi tshig A tAm/ mang po'i don rnams la mang po'i tshig an+ta'o/ /skyes bu dbus ma la gcig gi don la gcig gi tshig thAs/ gnyis dag gi don la gnyis kyi tshig A thAm/ mang po'i don rnams la mang po'i tshig d+h+wa ma'o/ /

skyes bu phyi ma la yang gcig gi don la gcig gi tshig i/ gnyis dag gi don la gnyis kyi tshig ba hi/ mang po'i don rnams la mang po'i tshig ma hi'o/ /i'i yi ge 'dra ba'i yi ge ma yin pa la ya ste pha rol dbyi ba'ang ma yin no zhes pas bi'i sgra'i i yig ya nyid do/ /

bya dza ya ta/ bya dza ye tAM/ bya dza yan+ta/ bya dza ya thAH/ bya dza ye thAM/ bya dza ye d+h+waM/ bya dza ye/ bya dza yA ba hi/ bya dza yA ma hi/ ba rA dza ya ta/ b+hu/ a b+ha ba ta/ r-i thob pa la'o arti'i r-its+tsha'o/ /dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o zhes pas 'phel pa A ra'o/ /a Ta'i dmigs

bsal lo/ /Ar+ts+tsha ta/ sam las ga mi zhes pa la sogs pas las mtshon par byed pa las mtshon par byed pa la ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /sa mAr+ts+tsha ta/ sha d+l-i/ sa di'i sI da'o/ /a sI data/ sa di las pra ti ma yin pa'i zhes pas a Ta'i mtha'i yang sa'i Sha nyid

do/ /n+ya ShI da ta/ Shan+dza a sa dza ta/ s+thA/ se ni/ se d+ha ti zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyi Sha nyid do/ /a b+h+ya Sha dza ta/ Sh+wan+dza/ a swo dzata/ snga ma bzhin Sha nyid do/ /a b+h+ya Sha dza ta/ de la yang smos pa las/ pa ri/ ni/ bi rnams las gzhan stau ti Sh+wany+dza dag gi yang rnam par bshad pa

las Sha nyid do/ /bar+Ya Sh+wa dza ta/ bar+Ya swa dza ta/ n+ya swa dza ta/ aT/ a yig gi A yig go zhes pas byings kyi dang po'i a yig gi A yig go/ /a Ta'i dmigs bsal lo/ /A Tata/ ga da/ a ga data/ Na da/ ag data/ Na da/ a na data/ a Da'i ga da la sogs pa'i cha shas

nyid las nyer bsgyur las/ na'i ga da zhes pa la sogs pas Na nyid do/ /bra N+ya na data/ pra N+ya na da ta/ I ha/ dbyangs dang po rnams 'phel ba I yig gi 'phel ba ai yig go/ /ai ha da/ U ha/ U yig gi 'phel ba au yig go/ /au hata/ Sha ha/ a sa ha te/ k+Sha nyid las

ka tha sogs ma yin pa rnams la dang Sha mtha' ma yin pa rnams la nye bar bstan pa'i byings rnams la yang na'o zhes pas nyer bsgyur gyi don rnams kyis na'i yang na Na nyid do/ /pra N+ya pa tsata/ pra N+ya pa tsata/ pra N+ya pa thata/ pra N+ya pa thata/ bI d+h-i/ a bA d+hata/ pra N+ya bA d+ha ta/ pra N+ya bA d+ha ta/ e d+ha/ e

yig gi 'phel ba ai yig go/ /ai d+hata/ ad/ a na'i 'jig go/ /a yig gi A yig go/ /ad las aTa'o zhes pas di si dag la ngag dang par aTa'o/ /Ta yig ni nges par bstan pa'i don no/ /A data/ At+tAM/ A dan/ A daH/ At+taM/ At+ta/ A dwaM/ Ad+ma/ pasha/

gsal byed las di si dag gi'o zhes pas di si dag gi dbyi'o/ /tsha sha dag gi'ang ngo zhes pas Sha nyid do/ /rdzogs pa la yang na'o zhes pas Sha'i dang po dang gsum pa Ta dang Da dag go/ /a baT/ a baDa/ gra hi/ dz+yA+e zhes pa la sogs pas sam+b+ra sA ra Na'o/ /dbyangs dang po rnams

kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o zhes pas u yig gi 'phel ba au yig go/ /asti las so zhes pas hi'i tshig gis shes par byed pa las h+yasta nI la sogs pa'i yul la byings kyi dang por ni rkyen gyi bya ba bya ste/ phyis aT la sogs pa rnams so zhes pa'o/ /au Sh+TAM/ au shan/ a baT/

a baT/ au Sh+TaM/ au Sh+Ta/ a ba shaM/ a ba shwa/ a ba sh+ma/ ha na/ byings kyi dang por a Ta'o/ /gsal byed las di si dag gi dbyi'o/ /a ha na/ han+ti'i d+huT las byings thams cad pa la'o zhes pas na yig dbyi'o/ /a ha tAM/ gam han zhes pa la sogs pas u pa d+hA'i a

dbyi'o/ /u pa d+hA phyis pa'i 'ang ngo zhes pas ha'i g+ha nyid do/ /a g+han/ a han/ a ha taM/ a ha ta/ a ha naM/ a ha n+wa/ a ha n+ma/ ang las yam dang han dag rang gi yan lag gi las can dag kyang ngo zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /A hata/ A g+h+nA tAM/ A

g+h+nAta/ A ha thAH/ A g+h+nA thAM/ A ha d+h+waM/ a g+h+ni/ A ha n+wa hi/ A han+ma hi/ d+yu/ gsal byed dang po yon tan can byings thams cad pa la u ta'i 'phel ba'o/ /a d+yauta/ a d+yu tAM/ a d+h+yu ban/ a d+h+yauH/ a d+h+yu taM/ a d+h+yuta/ nA mi mtha'i yon tan no/ /o a pa'o/ /a d+ya baM/ a d+yu bi/ a d+yu ma/

de lta bu la sogs pa'o/ /ika dmigs bsal med pa bzhin 'gyur ba yis dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o zhes pas i yig gi 'phel ba ai yig go/ /a d+h+yai ta/ a d+h+yai tAM/ i Na'i 'ang ngo zhes pas byings kyi dang por aTa'o/ /iN bzhin i ka'i 'ang ngo zhes pas

e ti'i ya la'o zhes pas aTa'i a yig gi A yig go/ /a d+h+yA yan/ a d+h+yaiH/ a d+h+yai ta/ a d+h+yai ta/ e A ya'o/ /a d+h+yA yaM/ a d+h+yA ba/ a d+h+yA ma/ iN/ snga ma bzhin 'phel ba'o/ /aita/ ai tAM/ iNa'i 'ang ngo zhes pas ya nyid do/ /e ta'i ya la'o zhes pas a Ta'i a yig

gi A yig go/ /A yan/ aiH/ ai taM/ ai ta/ A yaM/ ai ba/ ai ma/ bI/ byings kyi dang por aTa'o/ /nA mi mtha'i yon tan no/ /a be te/ a bI tAM/ a bi yan/ a baiH/ a bI taM/ a bI ta/ e a ya'o/ /a ba yaM/ a bI ba/ a bI ma/ bid shes pa la'o/ /nA mi u

pa d+hA'i yon tan no/ /gsal byed las di si dag gi dbyi'o/ /rdzogs pa la yang na'o zhes pas da yig gi dang po dang / gsum pa ta yig dang da yig dag go/ /a beta/ a bed/ a bit+tAM/ si tsa a b+h+yasta bid Ata rnams las b+hU ma yin pa la ana'i usa'o

zhes pa'o/ /bid sogs kyi tshogs su byas pa la rtag tu ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir yang na ana'i usa'o/ /bid shes pa dang Ata mtha'i yul zhes pa bid sogs so/ /a bi duH/ a bi dan/ de la yang gi sgra'i mang po'i don nyid kyi phyir sam bi duH/ b+hA/ a b+hA ta/ a b+hA tAM/ a yig

gi us la'o zhes pas A yig dbyi'o/ /a b+huH/ a b+hA na/ de bzhin du yA la sogs pa'o/ /as yod pa la'o/ /asti las di si dag la'o zhes pas di si dag la ngag dang por ITa'o/ /a yig gi A yig go/ /A sI ta/ asti'i'o zhes pas yon tan med pa la a yig

gi A yig go/ /asti'i dang po'o'i zhes pas dbyi ba'i dmigs bsal las yang na a yig dbyi'o/ /aTa'i a yig A yig go/ /AstaM/ A san/ A sIH/ mr-i dzU/ mar+dz+dza'i mAr+dz+dzi'o/ /di si dag gi dbyi'o/ /b+h+r-i dza sogs rnams kyi Sha'o/ /rdzogs pa la yang na'o zhes pas

Sha'i dang po Ta dang gsum pa Da dag go/ /a mA r+Ta/ a mA r+Da/ a mr-iSh+TAM/ dbyangs yon tan med pa la yang na brjod par bya'o zhes pas yang na mAr+dz+dzi'o/ /a mArdzan/ a mr-i dza na/ ba tsa/ di si dag gi dbyi'o/ /tsa sde'i ki'o/ /rdzogs pa la yang na'o zhes pas dang po ka dang gsum pa

ga dag go/ /a bka /a bag /a bak+tAM/ a ba tsan/ ru dir/ rud sogs rnams las kyang ngo zhes pas di si dag las ngag dang por ITa'o/ /rud sogs las kyang de si dag gi tshig la aT 'gyur ro zhes kha cig go/ /a ro dIta/ a ro data/ rud sogs las byings thams cad

pa la'o zhes pas iT A ga ma'o/ /a ru di tAM/ a ru dan/ a ro dIH/ a ro daH/ de bzhin du nyi Sh+wa ba/ Sh+wa sa zhes pa 'di dag dang an yang ngo / /a yig gi A yig go/ /A nI ta/ a nata/ A nI tAM/ A nan/ A nIH/ A naH/ de la yang smos pa las an+ti'i mtha'i yang ngo zhes

pas Na nyid do/ /brA NIta/ brA NId/ dzak+Sha/ a dzak+ShIta/ a dzak+Shata/ a dzak+Shi tAM/ dzak+Sha sogs kyang ngo zhes pas a b+h+yasta'i ming ngo / /si tsa a b+h+yasta bid Ata rnams las b+hU ma yin pa las a na'i u sa'o zhes pas an gyi u sa'o/ /a dzak+ShuH/ a dzak+ShIH/ ak+ShaH/ dzA gr-i/ yon tan no/ /

di si dag gi dbyi'o/ /tshig mthar re pa'i rnam par bcad pa'o/ /a dzAgaH/ a dzA gr-i tAM/ a b+h+yasta rnams kyi us la'o zhes pas yon tan no/ /a dzA ga ruH/ da ri drA/ a da ri drAta/ a da ri dri tAM/ a b+h+yasta rnams kyi A yig go zhes pas A yig dbyi'o/ /a da ri druH/ tsa kA sr-i/

h+yasta nI'i di la sa'i ta'o zhes pas sa'i ta yig go/ /rdzogs pa la yang na'o zhes pas dang po dang gsum pa dag go/ /a tsa kAta/ a tsa kAd/ a tsa kAstAM/ a tsa kA suH/ h+yas nI'i si la yang na brjod par bya'o zhes pas yang na sa'i ta'o/ /a tsa kAta/ a tsa kAd/ a tsa kaH/ shA su/

a shA ta/ a shAd/ a shiSh+TAM/ a shA suH/ a ShAta/ a shAd/ a shAH/ tsak+Shing / A tsaSh+Ta/ A tsak+ShA tAM/ a tsak+Sha ta/ A tsaSh+ThAH/ A tsak+ShA thAM/ A tsaD+D+h+waM/ A tsak+Shi/ A tsak+Sh+wi hi/ A tsak+Sh+ma hi/ Ir ra/ dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /air+t+ta/ ai rA tAM/ air ta/ air+thA/

ai rA thAM/ air+d+h+waM/ ai ri/ airba hi/ airma hi/ IDa/ aiD+Da/ e DA tAM/ ai Data/ aiDaHthA/ ai DA thAM/ IT dzan dag gi sa dang d+h+wa la'ang ngo zhes pas iTa'o/ /ai Di d+h+waM/ I sha/ aiSh+Ta/ aiSh+Ta/ ai shA tAM/ ai sha ta/ ai Sh+thAH/ ai shA thAM/ ai shi d+h+waM/ A sa/ a yig gi A yig ste 'phel ba'i

dmigs bsal lo/ /Asta/ A sA tAM/ a sa ta/ Ang las shAs su/ A shA sta/ A shA sA tAM/ A shA sa ta/ bas kun nas 'gebs pa'o/ /a bsta/ a ba sA tAM/ a ba sa ta/ Ni si/ a niM sta/ a niM sA tAM/ a niM sa ta/ ShUd srog chags mngal nas skye ba la'o/ /a sU ta/

a su bA tAM/ a su ba ta/ shIng / a she ta/ a sha A tAM/ shi ti las an+ti'i dang por irA+o/ /a she ra ta/ ing / dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /a d+h+yai ta/ i ya ru bsgyur ro/ /'phel ba'o/ /a d+h+yai A tAM/ a d+h+yai ya ta/ a d+h+yai thAH/ a d+h+yai ya thAM/

a d+h+yai t+hAM/ a d+h+yai yi/ a d+h+yai ba hi/ a d+h+yai ma hi/ dI d+h+wi da/ a dI d+hI ta/ a d+hI d+h+yA tAM/ a dI d+h+ya ta/ dI d+hI/ be bI dag gi e yig ya yig dag la'o zhes pas mtha' dbyi'o/ /a dI d+hi/ de bzhin du/ be bI pa'o/ /d+nung / a h+nu ta/ a h+nu pA tAM/ a d+nu ba ta/ dwi Sha/

a dweT/ a dwiSh+TAM/ sitsa/ a b+h+yasta bid AT rnams las b+hu ma yin pa la ana'i usa'o zhes pa'i tshogs su byas pa'i rtag tu ba ma yin no zhes pas a na'i us su yang yang na 'gyur ro/ /a dwi ShuH/ a dwi Sha na/ a dwe Ta/ a dweT/ a dwiSh+TiM/ a dwiSha/ a dwe ShaM/ a dwi ShaM/ a

dwi Sh+wa/ a dwiSh+ma/ a dwi ShA tAM/ a dwi Sha ta/ a tiSh+ThAH/ a dwi ShA thAM/ a dwi Sha d+h+waM/ a dwi Shi/ a dwiSh+ba hi/ a dwiSh+ma hi/ du ha/ da dang po'i g+ha'o zhes pa'i mtha'i d+huDa la ha'i g+ha'o/ /phyis pa la'ang di si dag la'o zhes pas dang po de'i bzhi pa d+ha nyid do/ /rdzogs pa la yang na'o zhes

pas g+ha'i dang po ka dang gsum pa dag go/ /a d+hoka/ /a d+hog /a du g+d+haM/ a du han/ a d+hog /a du g+d+haM/ a dug+d+ha/ a do haM/ a du g+d+ha/ a du haM/ a du hwa/ a du h+ma/ a du g+d+ha/ a du hA tAM/ a du ha ta/ a du g+d+hAH/ a du hA thAM/ byings kyi gsum pa dang po'i g+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha mtha'i zhes pa la sogs

pa dang po da'i bzhi pa d+ha nyid do/ /a du g+d+h+waM/ /a du hi/ a du h+ba hi/ a du h+ma hi/ di ha/ a d+heka/ /a d+heg/ a d+hi g+d+hAM/ a di han/ a d+hi g+ha/ a dI hA tAM/ a di ha ta/ liha/ ha'i D+ha'o zhes pas mtha'i d+huT la'ang ha'i D+ha'o/ /rdzogs pa la yang na'o zhes pas D+ha'i dang po'i dang gsum pa Ta

dang Da dag go/ /a leDa/ a leDa/ d+ha la d+ha'i dbyi ste u pa d+hA'i ring po yang ngo / /a lI D+hI/ a li han/ a lI D+ha/ a li hA tAM/ a li ha ta/ Ar+N+Nu nya/ h+yasta nI la yang ngo zhes pas gsal byed dang po yon tan can la rtag tu yon tan no/ /dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /

aur+N+Nota/ aur+N+No tAM/ aur+N+Nu baN/ aur+N+NoH/ aur+N+Nu tAM/ aur+N+Nu ta/ nA mi mtha'i yon tan no/ /o a ba'o/ /aur+N+Na baM/ aur+N+Nu ba/ aur+N+Nu ma/ aur+N+Nu ta/ aur+N+Nu bA tAM/ aur+N+Nu ba ta/ Sh+Tu nya/ gsal byed dang po yon tan can byings thams cad pa la u ta'i 'phel ba'o/ /a/ stau ta/ a stutAM/ a stu ban/ a stauH/

astu taM/ astu ta/ asta baM/ a stu ba/ a stu ma/ a stu ta/ a stu bA tAM/ a stu ba ta/ nyer bsgyur las su no ti'i zhes pa la sogs pas Sha nyid do/ /a b+h+ya Sh+Tau ta/ a b+h+ya Sh+Tu ta/ pa ri ni/ bi rnams las se ba ti'i zhes pa mtha' dbyi ba rnam par bshad pa'i yul la yang stau ti Sh+wany+dza

dag gi yang zhes pas yang na Sha nyid do/ /par+Ya Sh+Taud/ par+Ya stau ta/ par+Ya Sh+Tu ta/ par+Ya sta ta/ de bzhin du ni dang bi dag las so/ /brUnya/ bru las dag dang por ITa'o zhes pas gsal byed dang po yon tan can la dag dang por ITa'o/ /a bra bIta/ a brU tAM/ a bru ba na/ a bru bIH/ a brU taM/ a brU ta/

a bra baM/ a brU ba/ a brU ma/ a brU ta/ a brU bA tAM/ a brU ba ta/ hu/ a dzu ho ta/ a dzu hu tAM/ gnyis ka a b+h+yasta'o zhes pas a b+h+yasta'i ming ngo / /si tsa ya b+h+yasta bid Ata rnams las b+h+ru ma yin pa la ana'i usa'o zhes pas a na'i usa'o/ /a b+h+yasta rnams kyi us la'o zhes pas yon tan

no/ /o a ba'o/ /a dzu ha buH/ nyi b+hI/ a bi b+he ta/ a bi b+hi tAM/ a ba b+hI tAM/ e a ya'o/ /a bi b+ha yuH/ hrI/ a dzi hre ta/ a dzi hrI tAM/ a dzi hra yu/ r-i/ sr-i/ r-i'i yi ge/ a yig go/ /arti pi brti dag gi yang ngo / /a b+h+ya sa'i 'dra ba'i yi ge ma yin pa la'o zhes pas i ar

bsgyur ro/ /dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /ai y+r-i ta/ ai y+r-i tAM/ ai ya ruH/ thams cad yon tan can no/ /a si sa/ a si sri s+t+waM/ a si sa ruH/ b+ha sa/ a ba b+ha ta/ a ba b+had/ a ba b+ha s+t+wAM/ a ba b+ha suH/ a ba b+ha sa'i byings thams cad pa la ta yig go/ /a

ba b+ha ta/ a ba b+ha ta/ a ba b+haH/ ki dang ki ta shes pa la'o/ /a tsi ke ta/ a tsi ki tAM/ a tsi ki yuH/ a tsi ke ta/ a tsi ked/ a tsi kit+tAM/ a b+h+yasta'i yang u pa d+hA nA mi'i byings thams cad pa yon tan can la dbyings la'o zhes pas yon tan med pa can gzung ba las yon tan can gyi

yang yon tan bkag go/ /a tsi ki tuH/ a tsi keta/ tshig mthar si la re pha'i rang bzhin dag kyang ngo zhes pas yang na da d+ha dag gi da nyid du 'gyur ro/ /a tsi ked/ a tsi keH/ a tsi kit+tAM/ a tsi ke taM/ a tsi kid+ba/ a tsi kit+ma/ dza na/ a dza dza na/ a dza dzA tAM/ a dza dz+nyuH/

a dza dza na/ a dza dzA taM/ a dza dzA ta/ a dza dza naM/ a dza dzA ba/ a dza dzA ma/ nges pa med pa la'ang A ga ti zhes pa la sogs pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /bya t+ya dza dzA ta/ bya t+ya dza dz+nyA tAM/ bya t+ya dza dz+nyA ta/ bya t+ya dza dz+'a th+'aH/ bya t+ya dza dz+nyA thAM/ I Ta dzan dag

gis dang d+h+wa la'ang ngo zhes pas iT A ga ma'o/ /bya t+ya dza dz+nyi d+h+waM/ Ni dzir/ a ne ne ka/ a ne ne ga/ a ne ni k+tAM/ a ne ne dzuH/ a ne ne ka/ /a ne neg/ a ne ni k+taM/ a ne ne g+ha/ a ne ne dzaM/ a ne ne dz+ba/ a ne ne dz+ma/ a ne ni k+ta/ a ne ni dzA tAM/ a ne ni dza ta/ de bzhin du bi dzrera'o/ /bi Sh+laM/ a ba beT/

a be beT/ a be biSh+TAM/ a be bi ShuH/ a be biSh+Ta/ a be bi ShA tAM/ a be bI Shata/ Du dAnya/ a da dAta/ a dat+tAM/ a da duH/ a dat+ta/ a da dA tAM/ a da da ta/ Du d+hA nya/ a da d+ha d+ha ta/ a da d+hA t+tAM/ a da d+huH/ a d+hat+ta/ a da d+hA tAM/ a da d+hata/ Dub+h+r-inya/ a bi b+haH/ a bi b+h+r-i tAM/ a bi b+ha

ruH/ a bi b+h+r-i ta/ a bi b+h+ra tAM/ a bi b+h+ra ta/ mAd tshad la ste sgra la yang ngo / /a mi mI ta/ a mi mA tAM/ a mi ma ta/ o hAng / a dzi hI ta/ a dzi hA tAM/ a dzi ha ta/ di bu/ a di bya ta/ a dI bya tAM/ a di byan/ a dI byaH/ a dI bya taM/ a dI bya ta/ a dI byaM/ a dI byA ba/ a dI byA ma/

Shi bu a sI bya te/ a Tas bar chod pa dag la rnam par bshad do zhes pas yang na Sha nyid do/ /par+Ya ShI byata/ par+Ya sI bya ta/ de bzhin du ni dang bi dag las so/ /Sho/ a pya ta/ nyer bsgyur las su no ti'i zhes pa la sogs pas Sha nyid do/ /a b+h+ya Sh+ya ta/ Shung srog chags rab tu skye ba

la'o/ /a sU ya ta/ a sU ye tAM/ a sU yan+ta/ a sU ya thAH/ a sU ye thAM/ a sU yA d+h+waM/ a sU ye/ a sU yA ma hi/ a sU yAm hi/ Shu nya/ a su no ha/ a su nu tAM/ a su n+wa na/ a su noH/ a su nu ta/ a su na baM/ a su n+wa/ a su nu ba/ a sun+ma/ a su nu ma/ a su nu ta/ a su

n+wa tAM/ a su n+wa ta/ a su nu thAH/ a su n+wa thAM/ a su na d+h+waM/ a su n+wi/ a su nu ba hi/ a su nu ma hi/ a su n+wa hi/ a sun+ma hi/ nyer bsgyur las su no ti'i zhes pa la sogs pas Sha nyid do/ /a b+h+ya Shu No ta/ a b+h+ya Shu Nu ta/ a p+l-i/ a yig gi A yig ste/ 'phel ba'i dmigs bsal lo/ /

A p+nota/ A p+nu tAM/ A p+nu ban/ AM p+noH/ A p+nu taM/ A p+nu ta/ A p+na baM/ A p+nu ba/ A p+nu ma/ tu ta/ a tu data/ a tu da tAM/ a tu dan/ a tu daH/ a tu da taM/ a tu da ta/ a tu daM/ a tu dA ba/ a tu dA ma/ a tu da ta/ a tu de tAM/ a tu dan ta/ a tu da thAH/ a tu de thAM/ a tu de d+h+waM/

a tu de/ a tu dA ba hi/ a tu dA ma hi/ Shi tsa/ a si cata/ s+thA/ se ni/ sa d+ha ti zhes pa la sogs pas Sha nyid do/ /a b+h+ya Shi ny+tsa ta/ a b+h+ya Shiny+tsi ta/ r-iShI 'gro ba la'o/ /dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /AR+Sha ta/ rits+tsha/ Ar+ts+tshata/ sam las ga mi zhes pa la sogs

pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /sa mA r+ts+tshad/ i Sha/ aits+tsha ta/ ub+dza ta/ ordzata/ udz+dz+ha/ odz+dz+ha/ ru d+hi ra/ a ru NaT/ a ru na d+hAM/ a ru na d+ha na/ tshig mthar si la dang d+ha dag gi re pha'i rang bzhin dag tu'ang yang na 'gyur ro/ /a ru NaH/ a ru Na ta/ a ru Nad/

rdzogs pa la yang na'o zhes pas d+ha'i dang po dang gsum pa dag go/ /a ru na d+haM/ a ru na d+ha/ a ru Na d+haM/ a ru d+h+wa/ a ru na d+h+ma/ a ru na d+ha/ a ru na d+hA tAM/ a ru na d+ha ta/ a ru na d+ha thAH/ a ru na d+hA thAM/ a ru na d+h+waM/ a ru ni d+hi/ a ru na d+h+wa hi/ a ru na d+h+mi hi/ b+hi dir/ a b+hi nata/ a b+hi

nad/ a b+hi t+tAM/ a b+hi na dan/ a b+hi naH/ a b+hi nata/ a b+hi nad/ a b+hin t+taM/ a b+hin t+ta/ a b+hi na daM/ a b+hin d+ba/ a b+hinad+ma/ i b+hin t+ta/ a b+hi na dA tAM/ a b+hin da ta/ a b+hin t+thaH/ a b+hin tA thAM/ a b+hin d+hi/ e b+hin+di/ a b+hin dwa hi/ a b+hin d+ma hi/ ts+tshi di ri/ gnyis kyi dngos po la

sogs pa'o/ /a ts+tshi nata/ ats+tshi nad/ ats+tshin t+taM/ ats+tshinat+ta/ a ts+tshin+da tAM/ a ts+tshin+da ta/ ri tsir/ a ri Na ka/ a ri Nag/ a ri k+tAM/ a riny+tsa na/ a ri Na ka/ a ri Nag/ a riM k+taM/ a rik+taM/ a ri NaM tsaM/ a riny+ts+wa/ a riny+tsa ma/ a rik+taM/ a ri ny+tsA tAM/ a riny+tsa ta/ a ri k+thAH/ a riny+tsA thAM/

a riM g+d+hAM/ a riny+tsi/ a riny+ts+wa hi/ a riny+ts+ma hi/ bi dzir/ a bi naka/ /a bi nag/ a biM k+tAM/ a biny+dzan/ a biM k+ta/ a bi ny+dza tAM/ a bany+dza ta/ b+hu dza/ a b+hu naka/ a b+hu nag/ a b+hu k+tAM/ a b+huny+dzan/ zas la b+hu dzi'i zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /a b+huk+ta/ a b+huny+dzA

tAM/ a b+huny+dza ta/ tr-i ha hi si/ gsal byed dang po yon tan can la/ tr-i hi'i bi ka ra Na las i Ta'o/ /Ta yig ni A ga ma'i don no/ /a tr-i NeT/ a tr-i Ne Da/ a tr-i Na D+h+waM/ a triM han/ a t-i NeT/ a tr-i NeDa/ a tr-i N+D+haM/ a tr-i N+D+ha/ a tr-i Na haM/ a tr-iM hwa/ a tr-iM h+ma/ h+ya sta

nI'i di la sa'i ta'o/ /a hi na ta/ a hi nad/ a hiM stAM/ a hiM san/ h+ya sta nA'i si la yang na brjod par bya'o zhes pas sa'i yang na ta'o/ /a hi nata/ a hi nad/ a hi naH/ un+di/ dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /au na ta/ au nad/ au n+tAM/ au nan+da/ au nata/

any+dzU/ a yig gi A yig go/ /An ka /A nag /aM k+tAM/ A dzan/ nyi in+d+hI 'phel ba'o/ /ain+d+ha/ aid+hA tAM/ ain+d+ha ta/ ta nu/ a ta no ta/ a ta nu tAM/ a ta n+wan/ a ta noH/ a ta nu taM/ a ta nu ta/ a ta nu baM/ a ta nu ba/ a ta nu ma/ a ta nu ta/ a ta n+wA tAM/ a ta n+wa ta/

a ta nu thAH/ a ta n+wA thAM/ a ta nu d+h+waM/ a ta n+wI/ a ta n+wa hi/ a tan+ma hi/ a ta nu ba hi/ a ta nu ma hi/ brtsegs pa ma yin pa las u yig pa ma dag la yang na dbyi ba med do/ /r-i Nu 'phel ba'o/ /Ar+N+Nau ta/ Ar+N+Nu ta/ Du kr-inya/ a ka rota/ a ku ru tAM/ a kurban/ a ka roH/ a ku

ru taM/ a ku ruta/ a ka ra baM/ a kurba/ a kurma/ a ku ru ta/ a kurbA tAM/ a kurba ta/ a ku ru thAH/ a kurbA thAM/ a ku ru d+h+waM/ a kurbi/ a kurba hi/ a kurma hi/ a Tas bar chod pa la yang suT 'dod de/ sam ska ro ta/ sam sku ru ta/ de la yang smos pa las pa ri las a Tas

par chod pa'i su Ta'i yang na Sha nyid do/ /par+YaSh+ka ro ta/ par+Ya ska rota/ par+Ya Sh+kuruta/ par+Ya sku ru ta/ Du krI nya/ a krI NA ta/ a krI NI tAM/ a krI Nan/ a krI NaH/ a krI NI tAM/ a krI nI ta/ a krI NAM/ a krI NI ba/ a krI NI ma/ a krI NI ta/ a krI NA tAM/ a krI NA ta/ a krI NI thAH/ a krI NI thAM/

a krI NI d+h+waM/ a krI Ni/ a krI NI ba hi/ a krI NI ma hi/ i Sha yang yang la'o/ /'phel ba'o/ /aiSh+NA ta/ tsur/ a tsor ya ta/ a tsor ya tAM/ a tso ra yan/ a tso ra yaH/ a tsor ya taM/ a tso ra ya ta/ a tso ra yaM/ a tso ra yA ba/ a tso ra yA ma/ o la Di 'degs pa la'o/ /'phel ba'o/ /

au laN+Da yata/ ma tri/ a man+t+ra yata/ a man+t+ra ye tAM/ a man+t+ra yan+ta/ a man+t+ra ya thAH/ a man+t+ra ye thAM/ a man+t+ra ya d+h+waM/ a man+t+ra ye/ a man+t+ra yA pa hi/ a man+t+ra yA ma hi/ dngos po dang las dag la At+ma ne'i tshig rnams so/ /b+hA/ a b+hA ya yata/ a yA yita/ trai/ A nyid do/ /a trA ya ta/ Du dAnya/

dA Na/ do/ deng yang na'o/ /a dI ya ta/ a dI ya ta/ NI nya/ nI ya ta/ shru/ a shu ya ta/ b+hU/ a b+hU ya ta/ a nra b+hA ya ta/ gra ha/ ba sha mdzes pa la'o/ /gra hi dz+nyA/ zhes pa la sogs pas saM pra sA ra Na'o/ /a gr-i h+ya ta/ rang bzhin las snga ma la snga mar gyur pa'i nang gi yan

lag go zhes pas phyi'i rkyen las yaN 'di'i yang nang gi yan lag gi aT sngon du byas pa'i u'i yi ge la o'o/ /pha rol yang dbyi'o/ /de nas 'phel ba'o/ /yang na tshig gi nang gi yan lag la dang por yaN la sogs pa rnams so/ /au Sh+ya ta/ nyi Sh+wa pa/ ba tsa/ brU'i ba tsi

yang na'o/ /ya dza/ Du ba pa/ ba ha/ pe nya/ ba sa nges par gnas pa la'o/ /ba da gsal bar brjod pa la'o/ /swa pi ba tsi zhes pa la sogs pas saM pra sA ra Na'o/ /a su bya ta/ dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i snga mar 'phel ba'o/ /au ts+ya ta/ ai dz+ya ta/ au pya ta/ au pya ta/ shA

si ba si g+ha si rnams kyi yang ngo zhes pas Sha nyid do/ /au Sh+ya ta/ au d+ya ta/ pa tha/ a pa th+ya ta/ aT/ a yig gi A yig go/ /A D+ya ta/ zhes pa mkhan po sarba d+ha ras bkod pa'i ti la sogs pa'i mtha'i bya ba las h+yasta nI mdor bstan pa'o// //dpal ngag gi dbang

phyug rig 'dzin chen mo sgrol ma dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ni a d+ya ta nI'o/ /byung ba'i byed pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang ngo zhes pas 'das pa'i dus la byings las ad+ya ta nI'o/ /de rnams kyang rang ming rnams kyis dus kyi khyad par la'o zhes pas di ring 'das pa'i dus lkog tu gyur

pa la yang ste/ de ring lkog tu gyur pa la'ang ad+ya ta nI'o/ /lugs las langs nas lugs las kyang 'jug pa'i phyir mtshan mo gnyis sam nyin mo gnyis la 'jig rten 'jug par grub bo/ /snga ma bzhin skyes bu dang po la sogs pa rnams te/ gcig nyid la sogs pa

rnams la gcig tshig la sogs pa rnams so/ /yA thob pa la'o/ /byengs kyi dang por a Ta'o/ /a d+ya ta nI la si tsa'o zhes pas byings las pha rol tu si tsa'i rkyen no/ /i yig ni brjod pa'i don no/ /tsa yig ni dbyangs mtha' rnams kyi si tsa la pa rasmai la'o zhes pa'i

khyad par gyi don no/ /si tsa la sogs so zhes pas si tsa las pha rol gyi di si dag la ngag dang por I Ta'o/ /ya mi/ ra mi/ na mi/ Ata mtha' rnams kyi si mtha' 'ang ngo zhes pas i Ta'o/ /pa rasmai'i tshig la si tsa la iT A ga ma 'gyur ba la sogs pa'o/ /si mtha' 'ang ngo / /a yig

ni brjod pa'i don no/ /iT las kyang IT la'o zhes pas iT las pha rol gyi si tsa IT pha rol la dbyi'o/ /mtshungs pa'i ring po la sogs pa'o/ /a yA sIta/ rgyu mtshan las rkyen dang rnam 'gyur dang A ga ma la gnas pa'i sa'i Sha nyid do zhes pas sa yig gi dmigs bsal

med pa bzhin 'gyur ba yis rkyen la gnas pa'i Sha nyid do/ /Sha dang Ta sde las Ta'i sde'i Ta sde'o/ /a yA siSh+DAM/ si tsa a b+h+yasta bid AT rnams las b+hU ma yin pa la ana'i us so zhes pas b+hU las gzhan pa'i pha rol gyi gang si tsa de las pha rol gyi a na'i us su bsgyur ro/ /tshig mthar

sa yig gi rnam par bcad pa'o/ /a yA si ShuH/ a yA sIH/ a yA sISh+TaM/ a yA sISh+Ta/ a yA si ShaM/ a yA si Sh+wa/ a yA siSh+ma/ b+hA/ a b+hA sI ta/ bA/ a bA sIta/ prA/ a prA sI ta/ Sh+NA/ a snA sIta/ glai/ mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge nyid kyi phyir A nyid do/ /a glA sIta/ m+lai/

a m+lA sIta/ gai/ gI ta ma gA sIta/ trai/ a trA sta/ a trA sA tAM/ a yig ma yin pa las At+ma ne la yang ngo zhes pas A ti'i na dbyi'o/ /a trA sa ta/ a trA s+thAH/ a trA sA thA/ si tsi'i d+ha yig la'o zhes pas si tsa dbyi'o/ /a trA d+h+raM/ a trA si/ a trA swa hi/ a trA sma hi/ pyaing / a pyA sta/ gAng /

a gasta/ byenya/ a byA sIta/ a byA sISh+TAM/ a byA si ShuH/ a byA sta/ a byA sA tAM/ a byA sa ta/ mInya/ Du minya/ dIng / mI nA ti/ mi no ti/ dIng rnams kyi yon tan dang 'phel ba'i gnas la'o zhes pas dang por A nyid do/ /a mA sI ta/ a mA sISh+TaM/ a mA si ShuH/ a masta/ a mA sA staM/ a mA

sa ta/ phyi'i yan lag la nang gi yan lag grub pa ma yin no zhes pas dA'i ming la nang gi yan lag la phyi'i yan lag At+ma ne'i tshig grub bo/ /de nas dApa min pa'i dA d+hA dag la dA'o zhes pas dA'i ming med do zhes pa'o/ /s+thA dA dag gi a d+ya ta nI'i At+ma ne la i'o zhes pas i nyid do/ /

u pA di Sh+Ta/ u pA di ShA tAM/ u pA di Sha ta/ da ri drA/ A ga ma bstan pa mi rtag go zhes pas si mtha' yang na 'gyur ba la A gam gang yon tan can du 'gyur ba de gzung bas gzung bar bya'o zhes pa ste da ri drA ti'i byings thams cad pa ma yin pa la'o zhes pas A yig dbyi ba mthong

ba legs pa'i dbang las kyang sa yig nyid kyi mtha' dbyi ba med do/ /gzhan du ni yi ge mtha'i cho ga nyid las A yig nyid dbyi ba mthong ngo / /a dir drA sIta/ a da ri drI ta/ a da ri driSh+TAM/ a da ri dri ShuH/ a da ri drA siSh+TAM/ a da ri drA si ShuH/ i Na/ i Na'i gA ru bsgyur ro/ /

a gAta/ a gA tAM/ a guH/ ud gAta/ ni ra gAta/ a d+h+ya gAta/ a d+h+ya gA tAM/ a d+h+ya guH/ Sh+ShAM/ iN/ s+thA dA/ pi ba ti/ b+hU rnams las si tsa'i ba rasmai la'o zhes pas si tsa 'jig go/ /as+thA ta/ as+thA tAM/ rkyen phyis pa'i mtshan nyid kyis a na'i u sa'o/ /gang gi rkyen byas pa

la zhes pas snga ma'i rkyen la dbyi ba'i mtshan nyid bkag pa med do zhes pas pha rol gyi a na'i us nyid la A yig gi us la'o zhes pas a yig dbyi'o/ /as+thuH/ as+thAH/ as+thA taM/ as+thA ta/ as+thAM/ as+thA ba/ as+thA ma/ At+ma ne'i tshig la si tsa mi 'jig go/ /sam/ a ba/ pra/

bi rnams las zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /s+thA dA dag gi ad+ya ta nI'i At+ma ne la i'o zhes pas i nyid do/ /s+thA dag gi 'ang ngo zhes pas si tsa'i yon tan med pa nyid do/ /thung ngu las kyang iT med pa'i'o zhes pas d+huT la si tsa dbyi'o/ /sam s+thi ta/ sam

thi ShA tAM/ sam s+thi Sha ta/ sam s+thI thAH/ sam s+thi ShA thAM/ nA mi mtha'i byings las a ShI Sha a d+ya ta nI pa rok+ShA rnams la d+ha'i D+ha'o zhes pas d+ha yig gi D+ha nyid do/ /sa ma s+thi D+h+waM/ sa ma s+thi Shi/ sa ma s+thi Sh+wa hi/ sa ma s+thiSh+ma hi/ a ba s+thita/ prA s+thita/ s+thA/ se ni zhes pa la sogs pas sa'i

Sha nyid do/ /bya t+yaSh+thi ta/ Du dAnya/ a dA ta/ a dA tAM/ a duH/ nges pa med pa la'ang A ga ti zhes pa la sogs pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /bya t+ya di te/ bya t+ya di ShA tAM/ bya t+ya di Sha ta/ dA Na sbyin pa la'o/ /de bzhin du do zhes pa 'di'o/ /deng /

a di ta/ a di ShA tAM/ a di Sha ta/ dai ba dang dA pa dag ni dA'i ming med do zhes pas de dag las si tsa mi 'jig go/ /a dA sI ta/ a dA si Sh+TAM/ a dA si ShuH/ pA 'thung la'o/ a pA ta/ a pA tAM/ a puH/ bi pa ti'i nges par bstan pa las/ bai dang pA ti'i dag las si tsa

mi 'jig go/ /a pA sIta/ a pA sISh+TAM/ a pa si ShuH/ g+h+rA/ shA/ ts+tshA/ sA/ d+heT rnams kyi yang na brjod par bya'o zhes pas g+h+rA la sogs pa rnams las pha rol gyi si tsa'i pa rasmai'i tshig pha rol la yang na 'jig go/ /g+h+rA/ a g+hA taH/ a g+h+rA tAM/ A g+h+ruH/ a g+hA/ sIta/ a g+h+rI siSh+TaM/ a g+h+rA

si ShuH/ sho/ a shAta/ a shA tAM/ a shuH/ a shA sIta/ a shA si ShuH/ ts+tso/ ats+tshA ti/ ats+tshA tA/ a ts+tsha tAM/ ats+tshuH/ ats+tshA sI sta/ ats+tshA sISh+TAM/ ats+tsha si ShuH/ Sho/ a sAta/ a sA tAM/ a suH/ a sA sIta/ a sA si Sh+TAM/ a sa si ShuH/ d+heT/ a d+hAta/ a d+hA tAM/ a d+huH/ a d+hA sIta/ a d+hA siSh+TAM/

a d+hA si ShuH/ nges pa med pa la'ang A ga ti zhes pa la sogs pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /s+thA dA dag gi a d+ya ta nI'i At+ma ne la i'o zhes pas a nyid do/ /s+thA da dag gi'ang ngo zhes pas yon tan med pa nyid do/ /thung ngu las kyang i Ta med pa'i 'o zhes pas d+huT las

si tsa dbyi'o/ /bya t+ya d+hi ta/ bya te d+hi ShA tAM/ bya t+ya d+hi Sha ta/ shrI d+he Ta dag gi yang na bar brjod par bya'o zhes pas yang tsa na'i rkyen no/ /Na yig ni Na yig rjes su 'brel pa dang tsa krI yi ta dag las ma yin no zhes pa'i khyad par gyi don no/ /'di nyid kyi yon tan med pa nyid do/ /tsa yig ni/ tsa na

pa rok+Sha tse krI yi ta san mtha' rnams la'o zhes pa'i khyad par gyi don no/ /'di nyid kyis d+hA zhes pa 'di'i gnyis brjod do/ /thung ngu'o gnyis pa bzhi pa dag gi dang po gsum pa dag go zhes pas d+hA'i da'o/ /byings thams cad pa ma yin pa la A dbyi'o zhes pas A yig dbyi'o/ /

a da d+ha ta/ a da d+ha tAM/ a da d+ha na/ a da d+haH/ a da d+ha taM/ a da d+ha ta/ a dang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge'i cho ga'o/ /a da d+haM/ a'i ba ma dag la ring po'o/ /a da d+hA ba/ a da d+hA ma/ bya t+ya da d+hata/ a las A tAM A thAM dang po'i i'o/ /a'i yi ge i'i yi ge la e'o/ /pha rol

yang dbyi'o/ /bya t+ya da d+he tAM/ bya t+ya da d+han+ta/ bya t+ya da d+ha thAH/ bya t+ya da d+he thAM/ bya t+ya da d+ha d+h+waM/ bya t+ya da d+he/ bya t+ya da d+hA ba hi/ bya t+ya da d+hA ma hi/ khyA/ a su/ ba tsi/ khyA ti/ li bi/ si tsA/ hwA las aN 'o zhes pas ana'o/ /Na yig ni snga ma bzhin gyi khyad par gyi don no/ /a khyad/ a khya tAM/ a

khyan/ tsak+Shi nga'i nya yig ni/ nya rjes su 'brel pa nyid las gnyi ga'i tshig go/ /A khyata/ A khya tAM/ A khya na/ A khyata/ A khye tAM/ A khyan+ta/ hwe nya/ snga ma bzhin ana'o/ /A hwata/ A hwa tAM/ A hwan/ de la rnam par gzhag pa yang na ba spyir btang ba las li pa la sogs pa rnams kyi

At+ma ne'i tshig la yang na Ana'o/ /a hwata/ a hwe tAM/ a hwan+ta/ a hwAsta/ a hwAsA tAM/ a hwAs ta/ n+ya hwa ta/ n+ya hwA sta/ bya hwa ta/ bya hwa sta/ u bA hwa ta/ u pA hwA sta/ 'gran pa la Ang las so/ /sa mA hwata/ sa mA hwA sta/ dzi/ dbyangs mtha' rnams kyi si tsa la pa rasmai la'o zhes pas byings kyi

i yig gi 'phel ba ai yig go/ /a dzai ShI ta/ a dzai Sh+TAM/ a dzai ShuH/ a dzai ShIH/ a dzai Sh+TAM/ a dzai Sh+Ta/ a dzai ShaM/ a dzai Sh+wa/ a dzai Sh+ma/ bi dang pa rA dag las dzi'o zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /rtag tu ba nyid kyi phyir nang gi yan lag nyid las nA mi'i yon tan med pa ma

yin no/ /de'i phyir rgyu mtshan med pa las thung ngu las kyang i Ta med pa'i'o zhes pas si tsa dbyi ba med do/ /bya dzeSh+Ta/ bya dze ShA tAM/ bya dze ShA ta/ bya dze Sh+ThAH/ bya dze ShA thAM/ bya dze D+D+h+waM/ bya dze Shi/ bya dze Sh+wa hi/ bya dze Sh+ma hi/ pa rA dze Sh+Ta/ tsi nya/ a tsai ShI ta/ a tse Sh+Ta/ ing / a d+ya ta nI dang bya

ba shor ba dag la yang na gI ru bsgyur ro/ /a d+h+ya gi Sh+Ta/ a d+h+ya gI ShA tAM/ a d+h+ya gI Sha ta/ a d+h+ya gISh+ThAH/ a d+h+ya gI ShA thAM/ a d+h+ya gI D+h+waM/ a d+h+ya gI Shi/ a d+h+ya gI Sh+wa hi/ a d+h+ya gISh+ma hi/ dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /a d+hA+ai Sh+Ta/ a d+h+yai ShA tAM/ a d+h+yai Sha ta/ a d+h+yai Sh+ThAH/

a d+h+yai ShA thAM/ a d+h+yai D+h+waM/ a d+h+yai Shi/ a d+h+yai Sh+wa hi/ a d+h+yai Sh+ma hi/ tsi ri/ dzi ri 'tshe ba la'o/ /byings thams cad pa ma yin pa gsal byed pa dang po ya yig dang po min pa'i dang por iT A ga ma'o zhes pas si tsa la siT A ga ma'o/ /ai A ya'o/ /a tsi rA yIta/ a tsi

rA yiSh+TAM/ a tsi rA yi ShuH/ a dzi rA yi tA/ a dzi rA yi Sh+TAM/ a dzi rA yi ShuH/ Tu o shwi/ si tsa'o/ /iT A ga ma'o/ /shwi dzA gr-i dag gi yon tan no zhes pas 'phel ba'i dmigs bsal yon tan no/ /e a ya'o/ /a shwa yIta/ a shwa yiSh+TAM/ a shwa yi shuH/ shwi d+heDa dag gi yang na bar brjod par

bya'o zhes pas yang na tsaN 'gyur ro/ /tsaN ba ro k+ShA zhes pa la sogs pas gnyis brjod do/ /a b+h+yA sa'i gsal byed dang po lhag mar bya'o zhes pas gsal byed dang po lhag mar bya'o ste dang po ma yin pa'i gsal byed kyi'ang dbyi'o/ /byings kyi i'i yi ge dang u'i yi ge dag mtha'i dbyangs dang po zhes pa la sogs

pas a yi ru bsgyur ro/ /a shi shwi yata/ a shi shwi ya tAM/ a shi shwi yan/ dzrI/ shwi/ stan+b+hu/ mru tsu/ m+lu tsu/ glu tsu rnams kyi yang ngo zhes pas yang na aN 'gyur ro/ /shwi yi ata du brjod par bya'o zhes pas e yig gi a yig go/ /a shwata/ a shwa tAM/ ji srid 'byung ba de

srid cho ga zhes pas slar yang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge'i cho ga'o/ /a shwan/ shrinya/ shri/ dru/ sru/ ka mi/ ka ri ti'i mtha' rnams las byed pa po la tsaNa'o zhes pas tsaNa'o/ /tsaN pa rok+ShA zhes pa la sogs pas gnyis brjod do/ /a b+h+yA sa'i gsal byed dang po lhag mar bya'o/ /snga ma

bzhin i ya ru bsgyur ro/ /a shi shri yata/ a shi shri ya tAM/ a shi shri yan/ a shi shri yata/ a shi shri yi tAM/ a shi shri yan ta/ sming si tsa la nA mi mtha'i yon tan no/ /asmeSh+Ta/ a me ShA tAM/ asme Sha ta/ asmeSh+ThAH/ asme ShA thAM/ si tsa'i d+ha yig la'o zhes pas si tsa dbyi'o/ /nA mi

mtha'i byings las zhes pa la sogs pas d+ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /asme Shi D+h+waM/ asme Shi/ asme Sh+wa hi/ asmeSh+ma he/ i ka /iN bzhin i ka'i 'ang ngo zhes pas gA ru bsgyur ro/ /byings kyi dang por aTa'o/ /de bzhin du iN/ s+thA dA zhes pa la sogs pas si tsa 'jig go/ /

a d+h+ya gA ta/ a d+h+ya gA tAM/ rkyen gyi dbyi ba mtshon par byed pas na/ si tsa a b+h+yasta bid A ta rnams las b+hu ma yin pa la ana'i usa'o/ /a yig gi us la'o zhes pas A yig dbyi'o/ /a d+h+ya guH/ a d+h+ya gAH/ a d+h+ya gA tAM/ a d+h+ya gA ta/ a d+h+ya gA ma/ a d+h+ya gA ba/ a d+h+ya gA ma/ i Na'i

ga'o zhes pas gA ru bsgyur ro/ /byings kyi dang por aTa'o/ /iN s+thA zhes pa la sogs pas si tsa 'jig go/ /a gAta/ a gA tAM/ a guH/ nyi b+hI/ dbyangs mtha' rnams kyi si tsa la ba rasmai la'o zhes pas I yig gi 'phel ba ai yig go/ /a b+hai ShI ta/ a b+hai Sh+TAM/ a b+he

ShuH/ a b+hai ShIH/ a b+hai Sh+TaM/ a b+hai Sh+Ta/ a b+hai ShaM/ a b+haiSh+wa/ a b+haiSh+ma/ hrI/ a hrai ShI ta/ pIng btung ba la'o/ /si tsa la nA mi mtha'i yon tan no/ /a peSh+Ta/ a pe ShA tAM/ a pe Sha ta/ a paSh+ThAH/ a pe ShA thAM/ snga ma bzhin si tsa dbyi'o/ /d+ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /a be D+h+wa/ a pe

Shi/ a pe Sh+wa hi/ a peSh+ma hi/ NI nya/ a nai ShI ta/ a ne Sh+TAM/ a nai ShuH/ a neSh+Ta/ a ne ShA tAM/ a ne Sha ta/ Du krI nya/ a krai ShI ta/ a krai Sh+Ta/ lIng sbyor bar byed pa la'o/ /a lai ShI ta/ a lai Sh+TAM/ a le ShuH/ lA ti yis/ a lA sIta/ a lA siSh+TAM/ a lA si ShuH/ ing 'gro

ba la'o/ /dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /ai Sh+Ta/ ai ShA tAM/ ai ShA ta/ lIng sbyor bar byed pa la'o/ /n+ya le Sh+Ta/ n+ya le ShA tAM/ n+ya le Sha ta/ lA tu yis/ n+ya lAsta/ n+ya lA sA tAM/ n+ya lA sa ta/ 'di'i don ni yon tan dang 'phel ba'i gnas la ya dza sogs so/ /Ting / si tsa'o/ /

iTa'o/ /e a ya'o/ /a Da yiSh+Ta/ a Da yi ShA tAM/ aDa yi ShA ta/ a Da yiSh+ThAH/ a Da yi ShA thAM/ snga ma bzhin si tsa phyis pa la nA mi mtha'i byings las A shI Sha zhes pa la sogs pas mtha' gzung ba'i snga ma nA mi'i mthar gyur pa'i don nyid las ming sngon ma chan gyi cho ga mi rtag go zhes

rang bzhin shin tu rnam par bshad pa grub bo zhes pas yang na d+ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /a Da yi D+h+waM/ a Da yi d+h+waM/ a Da yi Shi/ a Da yi Sh+wa hi/ a Da yi Sh+ma hi/ shIng a sha yiSh+Ta/ dI d+hIng / dI d+hI b+he bI dag gi i yig ya yig dag la'o zhes pas mtha' dbyi'o/ /a dI d+hiSh+Ta/

a dI d+hi ShA tAM/ A dI d+hi Sha ta/ a di d+hiSh+ThAH/ a dI d+hi ShA thAM/ de la mtha' gzung ba'i snga ma nA mi'i mthar gyur pa'i don nyid la yang ming sngon ma can gyi cho ga mi rtag go zhes pas yang na d+ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /A dI d+hi D+h+waM/ A dI d+hi d+h+waM/ shru thos pa la'o/ /

snga ma bzhin u yig gi 'phel ba au yig go/ /a shrauSh+TI/ a shrau Sh+TAM/ a shrau ShuH/ a shrau ShIH/ a shrauSh+TaM/ a shrau Sh+Ta/ a shrau ShaM/ a shrau Sh+wa/ a shrau Sh+ma/ sa ma shro Sh+Ta/ hu/ a hau Sh+TI/ d+yu/ a d+yauSh+TI/ Shu rab tu skye ba la'o/ /stu/ su/ d+hunya/ rnams las par sme la'o zhes

pas si tsal iTa'o/ /stau ti dang lhan cig spyod pa las gnyi ga'i tshig go/ /de la smos pa'i phyir su ni ti las a sA bIta/ dru sru 'gro ba la'o/ /shri dru sru ka mi/ kA ri ti'i mtha' rnams las byed pa po la tsa na'o zhes pas tsa Na'o/ /gnyis brjod do/ /a b+h+ya sa'i gsal byed dang po

lhag mar bya'o/ /byings kyi i'i yi ge dang u'i yi ge dag mtha'i dbyangs dang po la zhes pa la sogs pas u ba ru bsgyur ro/ /a du dru ba ta/ a du dru ba tAM/ a du dru ban/ a su sru bta/ gu bshad pa 'dor ba la'o/ /kuT sogs kyi in itsa aT rnams ma yin pa la'o zhes

pas si tsa'i yon tan med pa nyid do/ /si tsa A shI Sha dag la yang At+ma ne la'o zhes pa 'dir At+ma ne gzung ba la yon tan bkag cing 'phel ba med do zhes pa'i shes par byed pa nyid las 'phel ba med do/ /ma gu bI ta/ thung ngu las kyang iT med pa'i'o zhes pas si tsa dbyi'o/ /

a gu tAM/ a gu ShaH/ d+hu 'gro ba dang brtan pa nyid dag la'o/ /a d+h+ru bIta/ a d+h+ru tAM/ a d+h+ru ShuH/ Sh+Tu nya/ Shunya/ d+hunya/ stu su d+hu nya rnams las pa rasmai la'o zhes pas pa rasmai'i tshig la si tsa la iTa'o/ /snga ma bzhin 'phel ba'o/ /o A ba'o/ /a stA bIta/ a stA biSh+TaM/

asta bi ShuH/ asta biH/ asta biSh+TaM/ astA biSh+Ta/ astA bi ShaM/ astA bi Sh+wa/ a stA biSh+ma/ nA mi mtha'i yon tan no/ /a stoSh+Ta/ asto ShA tAM/ asto Sha ta/ asto Sh+ThAH/ asto ShA thAM/ a sto D+h+waM/ asto Shi/ asto Sh+wa hi/ asto Sh+ma hi/ a sA bIta/ a soSh+Ta/ ad+hA bId/ a d+ho Sh+Ta/ tsud/

a ts+yoSh+Ta/ blung / a p+loSh+Ta/ yu sbel ba la'o/ /byings thams cad pa ma yin pa gsal byed dang po ya yig dang po ma yin pa'i dang po iT A ga ma'o zhes pas si tsa la iT A ga ma'o/ /a yA bIta/ a yA bISh+TAM/ a yA bi ShuH/ ru sgra la'o/ /a rA bIta/ Nu bstod pa la'o/ /a nA

bId/ k+Shu/ a k+ShA pIta/ k+Sh+Nu/ a k+Sh+NA bIta/ N+Nu a snA bIta/ U r+N+Nu nya/ si tsa'o/ /iT A ga ma'o/ /U r+N+No ti'i yang na'o zhes pas gzhan gyi 'dod pa yis yang na 'phel ba'o/ /'dir ni phyogs gcig la 'phel pa nyid tshad ma'o/ /h+yasta nI la yang ngo zhes pa 'dir yang yi ge ma brjod pa bsdus

pa'i don nyid las/ Ur+N+No ti'i yang na yon tan no/ /yon tan med pa'i phyogs la snga ma bzhin 'phel ba med do/ /snga ma bzhin u ba ru bsgyur ro/ /dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /aur+N+NA bIta/ aur+N+NabIta/ aur+N+Nu bIta/ aur+N+NA biSh+TAM/ aur+N+Na biSh+TaM/ aur+N+Nu biSh+TAM/ au r+N+NA bi ShuH/ aur+n+na

bi ShuH/ aur+N+Nu bi ShuH/ aur+N+NA biSh+Ta/ aur+N+Na biSh+Ta/ aur+N+Nu biSh+'+tAM/ aur+N+NA bi ShA tAM/ au r+N+Na bi ShA tAM/ aur+N+Nu bi ShA tAM/ au r+N+NA bi Sha ta/ aur+N+Na bi Sha ta/ aur+N+Nu bi ShaSh+ta/ aur+N+NA biSh+ThAH/ aur+N+Na biSh+ThAH/ aur+N+Nu biSh+ThAH/ aur+N+NA biShA thAM/ aur+N+Na bi ShA thAM/ aur+N+Nu bi ShA thAM/ snga ma bzhin d+ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /au r+N+NA bi D+h+waM/ aur+N+Na bi

D+h+waM/ aur+N+Nu bi D+h+waM/ aur+N+NA bi d+h+waM/ aur+N+Na bi d+h+waM/ aur+N+Nu bi d+h+waM/ kung sgra la'o/ /nA mi mtha' yon tan no/ /a koSh+Ta/ a ko ShA tAM/ a ko Sha ta/ gang kuT sogs yin pa de las ni pha rol gyi si tsa'i yon tan med pa nyid do zhes pas yon tan med do/ /thung ngu las kyang iT med pa'i 'o zhes pas

si tsa dbyi'o/ /a ku te/ a ku ShA tAM/ a ku Sha ta/ ung sgra la'o/ /dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /auSh+Ta/ au ShA tAM/ au Sha ta/ lU nya/ si tsa'o/ /i Ta A ga ma'o/ /U yig gi 'phel ba au yig go/ /a lA bIta/ a lA biSh+TAM/ a la bi ShuH/ a la biSh+Ta/

a la bi ShA tAM/ a la bi Sha ta/ pU nya/ a pA bIta/ a pA biSh+TAM/ a pA bi ShuH/ a pa biSh+Ta/ a pa bi ShA tAM/ a pa pi Sha ta/ dru nya 'tshe ba la'o/ /a drA bIta/ a drA biSh+Ta/ d+hU nya/ a d+hA bIta/ a d+ha bIT/ mung / a ma biSh+Ta/ drUng / a da biSh+Ta/ Shu ded pa la'o/ /a sA bIta/ a sA biSh+TAM/

a sA bi ShuH/ Nu bstod pa la'o/ /d+hU rnam par 'dar bar byed pa la'o/ /kuT sogs so/ /snga ma bzhin 'phel ba'o/ /u ba ru bsgyur ro/ /a nu bIT/ a nu biSh+TAM/ a nu bi ShuH/ a d+hu bIta/ a d+hu biSh+TAM/ a d+hu bI ShuH/ ShUng / swa ra ti/ sU ti/ su ya ti/ uta rjes

su 'brel pa las so zhes pas yang na iTa'o/ /a sa biSh+Ta/ a sa bi ShA taM/ a sa bi Sha ta/ a soSh+Ta/ a so ShA tAM/ a so Sha ta/ b+hU yod pa la'o/ /i Ni s+thA zhes pa la sogs pas pa rasmai'i tshig la si tsa'i 'jig go/ /b+hU las si tsa 'jig pa la'o zhes pas iT med do/ /

b+hU'i si tsa 'jig pa la'o zhes pas yon tan med do/ /a b+hU ta/ a b+hU tAM/ b+hu'i mtha' ba ro k+ShA dang / a d+ya ta nI dag la ba'o zhes pas dbyangs dang po'i mthar ba yig go/ /de la ba'i mtha' zhes brjod pa las an gyi us su bsgyur ba med do/ /a b+hU ban/ a b+hUH/

a b+hU taM/ a b+hU ta/ a b+hU baM/ a b+hU ba/ a b+hU ma/ nges pa med pa la'ang A ga ti zhes pa la sogs pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /si tsa'o/ /iTa'o/ /nA mi mtha'i yon tan no/ /o a ba'o/ /bya t+ya b+ha biSh+Ta/ bya t+ya b+ha bi ShA tAM/ bya t+ya b+ha bi Sha ta/

bya t+ya b+ha biSh+ThAH/ bya t+ya b+ha bi ShA thAM/ snga ma bzhin yang na d+ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /bya t+ya b+ha bi D+h+waM/ bya t+ya b+ha bi d+h+waM/ bya t+ya b+ha bi Shi/ bya t+ya b+ha bi Sh+wa hi/ bya t+ya b+ha biSh+ma hi/ de bzhin du as yod pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i as ti'i byings thams cad pa ma yin pa la b+hU'o zhes pas snga ma b+hU ru

bsgyur ro/ /a sti las di si dag la'o zhes pas ti pa'i byings las dbyangs gzung ba'i phyir gnas can bzhin 'gyur ba yis kyang iTa'o/ /smr-i snga ma bzhin r-i yig gi 'phel bar Ar yig go/ /a smAR+ShIta/ a smAR+Sha TAM/ a smAR+ShuH/ a smAR+ShiH/ a smAr+Sh+TaM/ a smAr+Sh+Ta/ a

smAR+ShaM/ a smAr+Sh+wa/ a smAR+Sh+ma/ h+r+w-i/ gya gyu nyid la'o/ /a hwAR+ShIta/ d+h+r+w-i gnod pa la'o/ /a d+h+waR+ShI ta/ sr-i 'gro ba la'o/ /a sAR+ShIta/ r-i rab tu thob par byed pa la yang ngo / /dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /AR+ShIta/ pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs l-i yig rjes su

'brel pa ar ti sar ti shAsti rnams las zhes pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig spyod pa las bi ka ra Na nyid 'jig pa gzung ba'i phyir 'di dag las aN med do/ /sam las ga mi zhes pa la sogs pas ru tsa nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /sa mAr+Sh+Ta/ samAR+Sha tAM/ sa mAR+Sha ta/

sa mAr+Sh+ThAH/ sa mAR+ShA thAM/ snga ma bzhin d+ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /sa mAr+D+h+waM/ sa mAR+Shi/ sa mAr+Sh+wa hi/ sa mAR+Sh+ma hi/ pr-ing / r-ita/ mtha' rnams kyi 'ang ngo zhes pas At+ma ne'i tshig la iT med pa'i si tsa la yon tan med pa nyid do/ /thung ngu las kyang iT med pa'i'o zhes pas d+huT la si tsa dbyi'o/ /

bya pr-i ta/ bya pr-i ShA tA/ bya pr-i Sha ta/ bya pr-i thAH/ bya pr-i ShA thAM/ d+ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /bya pr-i D+h+waM/ bya pr-i Shi/ bya pr-i Sh+wa hi/ bya pr-i Sh+ma hi/ mr-ing / A shISha dang / ad+ya ta nI'i dag la yang mr-inga'o zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /a mr-i ta/ a mr-i ShA tAM/ a mr-i Shata/

Du kr-inya/ a kAR+ShIta/ A kAr+Sh+DAM/ a kUR+ShaH/ a kr-i ta/ a kr-i ShA tAM/ a kr-i Sha ta/ hr-inya/ a hAR+ShIta/ A har+Sh+TAM/ a hAR+ShuH/ a hr-i ta/ a hr-i ShA tAM/ a hr-i Sha ta/ dzA gr-i/ si tsa'o/ /iT A ga ma'o/ /shwi dzA gr-i dag gi yon tan no zhes pas 'phel ba'i dmigs bsal yon tan no/ /a dzA

ga r-Ita/ a dzA ga r-iSh+TAM/ a tsa ga r-i ShuH/ s+r+w-i/ sA ra ti/ sU ti/ sU ya ti uta rjes su 'brel ba las so zhes pas yang na iTa'o/ /a swA rIta/ a swAR+ShIta/ a swA riSh+TAM/ a swAr+Sh+TAM/ a swA rI ShuH/ a swAR+ShuH/ br-ing / r-ita/ br-id/ br-inya rnams kyi san la iT yang na bar 'gyur te

si tsa A shI Sha dag la At+ma ne la zhes pas yang na iTa'o/ /r-ita/ br-ing / br-inya'i yang yang na ring po'o/ /pa rok+ShA dang / A shI Sha dag ma yin ba la iTa'o/ /pa rasmai ma yin pa'i si tsa la rab tu brjod do zhes sbyor ba rnam par phye ba las zhes pas yang na iTa'i ring po'o/ /

prA br-i ta/ a ba rISh+Ta/ a ba riSh+Ta/ a ba br-i ShA tAM/ a ba rI ShA tAM/ a ba ri ShA tAM/ a br-i Sha ta/ a ba rI Sha ta/ a be ri Sha ta/ iT med pa'i phyogs la rtag tu'o/ /iT dang bcas pa'i phyogs la'ang yang na snga ma bzhin d+ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /a br-i D+h+waM/ a ba rI D+h+waM/ a ba

ri D+h+waM/ a bA rI D+h+waM/ a ba ri d+h+waM/ br-inya las si tsa'o/ /iDa A ga ma'o/ /prA bA rIta/ prA bA riSh+TAM/ prA bA ri ShuH/ At+ma ne'i tshig la snga ma bzhin yang na iTa'o/ /iTa'i ring po'ang ngo / /prA br-ita/ prA ba rISh+Ta/ prA ba riSh+Ta/ prA br-i ShA tAM/ pra ba rI ShA tAM/

pra ba ri ShA tAM/ prA br-i Sha ta/ prA ba rI Sha ta/ prA pa ri Sha ta/ s+t+r-inya 'gebs pa la'o/ /A stA rIta/ AstAr+Sh+DA/ Asta R+ShuH/ At+ma ne'i tshig la r-ita/ br-ing br-inya rnams kyi san la/ iT yang na 'gyur te si tsa A shI Sha dag la At+ma ne la'o/ /brtsegs pa dang po'i r-ita'i brjod

par bya ba suT ni phyi rol du gyur par grub pa ma yin no zhes pas yang na iTa'o/ /As+t+r-ita/ A sta raSh+Ti/ A s+t+ri ShA tAM/ A sta ri ShA tAM/ As+t+ri Sha ta/ Asta ri Sha ta/ r-i sr-i/ 'gro ba la'o/ /puSha sogs d+yu ta sogs l-i yig rjes su 'brel pa/ a rti/ sarti/ shAsti rnams las kyang pa rasmai

la'o zhes pas aNa'o/ /arti/ sarti dag gis an la'o zhes pas yon tan no/ /a yig gi A yig go/ /A rata/ A ra tAM/ A ran/ sam las ga mi zhes pa la sogs pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o/ /sa

mAr+Sh+Ta/ sa mAR+ShA tAM/ sa mAR+Sha ta/ kha cig At+ma ne'i tshig la yang aN smra'o/ /samA ra ta/ sa mA re tAM/ sa mA raN+ta/ a sa ra ta/ a sa ra tAM/ a sa ran/ a sa ra ta/ a sa re tAM/ a sa ran+ta/ tr-I/ si tsa'o/ /iT A ga ma'o/ /'phel ba/ a yig gi A yig go/ /a tA rI ta/

a tA riSh+TAM/ a ta ri ShuH/ a tA rIH/ a tA riSh+TaM/ a tA ri Sh+Ta/ a tA ri ShaM/ a tA ri Sh+wa/ a tA riSh+ma/ pr-I/ a pA rIta/ gr-I nges par gnon pa la'o/ /dbyangs la yang na'o zhes pas yang na re pa'i la nyid do/ /a gA rIta/ a gA lIta/ a ba las gi ra zhes pas ru tsa sogs

nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /r-ita/ pr-ing / br-inya rnams kyi san la iT yang na 'gyur te si tsa A shISha dag la At+ma ne la'o zhes pas yang na iTa'o/ /a bA ga rISh+Ta/ a bA ga riSh+Ta/ a bA ga lISh+Ta/ a bA ga liSh+Ta/ r-ita mtha' rnams kyi 'ang ngo zhes pas r-i yig gis nye bar

mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir yon tan med pa nyid do/ /rIta mtha'i yon tan med pa la i ra'o/ /nA mi na'i ra ba dag ces ba la sogs pas ring po'o/ /a bA ga rI ShA tAM/ a bA ga ri ShA tAM/ a bA ga lI ShA tAM/ a bA ga li ShA tAM/ a bA gIR+ShA tAM/ snga ma bzhin d+ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /a bA ga rI D+h+waM/

a bA ga rI d+h+waM/ a bA ga li D+h+waM/ a bA ga ri d+h+waM/ a bA ga lID+h+waM/ a bA ga lI d+h+waM/ a bA ga li D+h+waM/ a bA ga li d+h+waM/ kr-Inya/ 'tshe ba la'o/ /a kA rIta/ a kA riSh+TAM/ a kA ri ShuH/ a ka rISh+Ta/ a kA riSh+Ta/ a ka rI ShA tAM/ a ka ri ShA tAM/ a kAR+ShI tAM/ a ka rI Sha ta/ a ka ri Sha ta/ a kAR+Shita/

s+t+r-Inya/ A stA rIta/ dzr-I lang tsho nyams pa la'o/ /dzr-I/ shwi/ stan+b+hu/ mru tsu/ m+lu tsu/ glu tsa rnams kyi yang ngo zhes pas yang na aN 'o/ /arti dang sarti dag gis aN la gnas can gyi yi ge nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir yon tan no/ /a dza rata/ a dza ra tAM/ a dza ran/ a dzA rIta/ a dzA riSh+TAM/

a dzA ri ShuH/ t+ya dza/ a yig 'ang ring po'o zhes pas pa rasmai'i tshig la si tsa pha rol la gsal byed mtha' rnams kyi iT med pa'i a yig gi ring po'o/ /tsa sde 'dra ba'i yi ge ma yin pa la ki'o zhes pas ki nyid do/ /rgyu mtshan las Sha nyid do/ /a t+yA k+ShIta/ d+huT las kyang d+huT

la'o zhes pas si tsa dbyi'o/ /at+yA k+ShAM/ at+yAk+ShuH/ a t+yAk+ShIH/ a t+yAk+taM/ a t+yAk+ta/ a t+yA k+ShaM/ a t+yA k+sh+wa/ a t+yASh+mak+Sh+ma/ bya d+ha/ sgra med pa rnams la shiT ma yin pa rnams kyi dang po'o zhes pas d+ha'i ta'o/ /a byAt+sAta/ g+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha rnams las d+ha ma yin pa las te tha dag gi d+ha'o/ /d+huT

rnams kyi bzhi pa rnams la gsum pa'o zhes pas rang bzhin d+ha yig gi da yig go/ /a byA d+hAM/ a byAt+suH/ a byAt+sIH/ a byA d+d+haM/ a byAd+d+haM/ a byAt+saM/ a byAt+s+wa/ a byAt+s+ma/ da ha/ da dang po'i g+ha'o zhes pas d+huT la ha yig gi g+ha yig go/ /byings kyi gsum pa dang po'i

g+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha mtha'i zhes pa la sogs pas sa dang d+h+wa dag pha rol la dang po da'i bzhi pa d+ha nyid do/ /sgra med pa rnams la shiT ma yin pa rnams kyi dang po'o zhes pas g+ha'i ka'o/ /a d+hA k+ShIta/ snga ma bzhin g+ha'i gsum pa ga'o/ /a dA g+d+hAM/ a d+hA k+ShuH/ a d+hA k+ShIH/ a dAg+d+haM/ a

d+hAk+ShaM/ a d+hAk+Sh+wa/ a d+hAk+Sh+ma/ ta pa kun nas gdung ba la'o/ /a tAp+sIta/ a tap+tAM/ a tap+suH/ a tAp+sIH/ a tAp+taM/ a tAp+ta/ a tAp+sAM/ a tAp+s+wa/ a tAp+s+ma/ ya b+ha/ sgra med pa rnams la shiT ma yin pa rnams kyi dang po'o zhes pas b+ha'i pa'o/ /a yAp+sIta/

d+huT rnams kyi bzhi ba rnams la gsum pa'o zhes pas b+ha'i ba'o/ /a yA b+haM/ a yAp+suH/ ya mi/ ra mi/ na mi/ Ata mtha' rnams kyi si mtha' 'ang ngo zhes pas ya mi la sogs pa rnams kyi si tsa dang pa rasmai'i tshig pha rol la dang por iT A ga ma 'gyur zhing si mtha' 'ang ngo / /

ya ma ma na dag gi d+huT la rjes su nga ro'o zhes pas ma'i rjes su nga ro'o/ /a yaM sIta/ a yaM siSh+TAM/ a yaM si ShuH/ Ang las yam dang han dag rang gi yan lag gi las can dag kyang ngo zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /a ya staM/ a yaM sA tAM/ a yaM

sA ta/ a yaMs+thaH/ a yaM sA thAM/ si tsa'i d+ha yig la dbyi'o/ /sde pa la sde pa'i mtha'o/ /a yan+d+h+waM/ a yaM si/ a yaM swa hi/ a yaM sma hi/ phra ma'i don la ni 'tshe ba las si tsa la At+ma ne mthong ngo / /phra ma'i don la ya mi las kyang zhes pas lnga pa dbyi'o/ /thung ngu las kyang

iT med pa'i'o zhes pas d+huT la sitsa dbyi'o/ /u dA ya ta/ u dA ya sA tAM/ u dA ya sa ta/ bag ma la u pa yam zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /'tshe ba las si tsa la At+ma ne mthong ngo / /phra ma'i don la ya mi las kyang bag ma la ni rnam par bshad pa yang na'o zhes

pas yang na lnga pa dbyi'o/ /u pA ya ta/ u pA yaMsta/ ram/ nyer bsgyur bi Ang pa ri rnams las kyang ra ma At+ma ne'i tshig ma yig zhing ru tsa la sogs pa'i tshogs su byas pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /bya raM sIta/ bya raM sISh+TAM/ bya raM si ShuH/ Nam/ a NaM sIta/ a naM sISh+TAM/ a naM

si ShuH/ nyi Sh+wa pa/ a'i 'ang ring po'o/ /a swAp+sIta/ a swAp+tAM/ a swAp+suH/ ba sa nges par gnas pa la'o/ /sa'i sa la byings thams cad pa ma yin pa la ta'o zhes pas sa yig gi ta yig go/ /a bAt+sIta/ si tsa dbyi ba la yang rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do zhes pas sa yig gi ta yig

go/ /a bAt+tAM/ a bAt+suH/ Tu ma rdzo gsal byed mtha' rnams kyi iT med pa'i'o/ /i ya 'ang ring po'o zhes grub pa la sbyor ba tha dad pa las u pa d+hA ma yin pa'i i'ang ring po'o/ /mardzi na sha dag gi d+huT la'o zhes pas dbyangs las pha rol tu na yig A ga ma'o/ /nang gi yan

lag nyid kyi phyir d+huT rnams kyi gsum pa'o zhes pas sa'i nga'o/ /ta sde'i tsa Ta'i sde pa la zhes pa la sogs pa da'i dza'o/ /de nas brash+tsi mardza dag gi d+huT la'o zhes pas mtha' dbyi'o/ /tsa sde'i 'dra ba'i yi ge ma yin pa la ki'o rjes sung ro'o/ /sde pa la sde pa'i mtha'o/ /a mad+k+ShI ta/ a

mAd+k+tAM/ a mAd+k+ShuH/ dan+sha/ tsha sha dag gi 'ang ngo zhes pas sha'i Sha'o/ /Sha D+ha dag gi sa la ka'o zhes pas sa yig la Sha'i ka'o/ /a dAM k+ShIta/ a dAMSh+TAM/ a dAM k+ShuH/ b+h+ra rdza/ b+h+r-idza sogs rnams kyi zhes pas b+h+r-idza'i nye bar mtshon pa la tshig phrad kyi 'dod pa'i yul nyid kyi phyir saM pra sA ra Na

las gzhan du rnam par bshad de b+h+r-i dza ru bsgyur ro/ /gsal byed mtha' rnams kyi iT med pa'i'o zhes pas pa rasmai'i tshig la 'phel ba'o/ /b+h+r-i dza sogs rnams kyi Sha'o zhes pas Sha nyid do/ /a b+hAr+k+ShIta/ a b+hAr+Sh+TAM/ a b+hAr+k+ShuH/ brtsegs pa'i dang po sa ka dag gi mtha' la'ang ngo zhes

pa sas dbyi'o/ /a b+hAk+ShIta/ a b+h+rASh+TaM/ a b+hAk+ShuH/ dgag pa nges par bstan pa mi rtag go zhes pas si tsa A shISha dag la'ang At+ma ne la'o zhes pas yon tan med pa nyid la nA mi u pa d+hA'i yon tan no/ /a b+ha r+k+Sh+Ta/ a b+ha r+k+ShA tAM/ a ba r+k+Shata/ a ba r+k+Sh+ThAH/ a bar+k+Sha thAM/ d+huT rnams kyi bzhi

pa rnams la gsum pa'o zhes pas Sha'i Ta'o/ /a b+har+D+d+hAM/ a b+h+raSh+Ta/ a b+h+rak+ShA tAM/ a b+h+rakA ta/ a b+h+raSh+ThAH/ a b+h+ra k+ShA thAM/ a b+h+ra d+d+hAM/ prats+tsha/ ts+tsha sha dag gi 'ang ngo zhes pas Sha nyid do/ /snga ma bzhin Sha'i ka'o/ /a prAk+ShI ta/ a praSh+TAM/ a prA k+ShuH/ sam las ga mi zhes pa la sogs

pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /sa ma draSh+Ta/ sa ma pra k+ShA tAM/ sa ma pra k+Sha ta/ 'dri ba la nu'o zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /praSh+Ta/ b+han+dzo/ tsa sde 'dra ba'i yi ge ma yin pa la ki'o/ /a b+hAM k+ShIta/ a b+hAM k+tAM/ a b+hAM k+ShuH/ rA d+ha/ sA d+ha/ a rAt+sIta/

a rAd+d+hAM/ a rAt+suH/ a sAt+sIta/ a sad+d+hAM/ a sAt+suH/ ha na/ han+ti'i A shISha la ba d+hi'o zhes pa spyir btang nas/ a d+ya ta nI la yang ngo zhes pas yang na ba d+hi ru bsgyur ro/ /na mtha' nyid ma yin pa'i phyir/ ha ni ma n+ya ti las na las so zhes pas iT bkag pa

med do/ /eta rjes su 'brel pa dang ha dang ma dang ya'i mtha' dang k+Sha Na dang shwa sa ma yin pa rnams kyi gsal byed dang po iT dang bcas pa rnams kyi yang na'o zhes pas yang na ring po med do zhes nges par bstan pa'i rang gi gzugs 'dzin pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /iT las kyang IT

la'o zhes pas si tsa dbyi'o/ /a ba d+hIta/ a ba d+hISh+TAM/ a ba d+hi ShuH/ a ba d+hIH/ a ba d+hiSh+TaM/ a ba d+hiSh+Ta/ a ba d+hi ShaM/ a ba d+hi Sh+wa/ a ba d+hiSh+ma/ Ang las lam dang han dag rang gi yan lag gi las can dag kyang ngo zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /a d+ya ta nI la

yang ngo zhes pa 'dir yang na'i sgra'i rnam par gzhag pa yang na bshad de/ des na At+ma ne'i tshig la yang na ba d+hi'o/ /a ba d+hiSh+Ta/ a ba d+hi ShA tAM/ a ba d+hi Sha ta/ a ba d+hiSh+ThAH/ ha ni las si tsa la At+ma ne mthong ngo zhes pas lnga pa dbyi'o/ /thung ngu las kyang iT med pa'i'o zhes pas si tsa dbyi'o/ /

A ha ta/ A ha sA tAM/ A ha sa ta/ ad/ a di'i san a d+ya ta nI dag la g+hasl-i'o zhes pas g+hasl-i ru bsgyur ro/ /puShA sogs d+yu ta sogs rnams kyi pa ra smai'i tshig la ana'o/ a g+ha sata/ a g+ha sa tAM/ a g+ha san/ nges pa med pa la'ang A ga ti zhes pa la sogs pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir

At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /si tsa'o/ /pa sa ti dang / g+ha si las sa las so zhes pas iT med do/ /si tsa phyis pa la yang rkyen phyis pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ sa'i sa la byings thams cad pa ma yin pa la ta'o zhes pas sa yig gi ta yig go/ /bya t+yA t+tA/ bya t+yAt+sA tAM/ byat+yAt+sad/ bya t+yAt+thAH/ byat+yAt+sA

thAM/ d+huT rnams kyi bzhi pa rnams la gsum pa'o zhes pas ta'i da nyid do/ /bya t+yAd+d+h+waM/ Du la b+ha Sha/ d+huT las kyang d+huT la'o zhes pas si tsa dbyi'o/ /g+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha rnams las d+hA ma yin pa las ta tha dag gi d+ha'o zhes pas ta tha dag gi gnas la d+ha yig go/ /d+huT rnams kyi bzhi pa rnams

la gsum pa'o zhes pas b+ha yig gi ba yig go/ /a lap+d+ha/ sgra med pa rnams la shiT ma yin pa rnams kyi dang po'o zhes pas b+ha yig gi pa yig go/ /a lap+sA tAM/ a lap+sa ta/ a lap+d+hAH/ a lap+sA thAM/ a lap+d+hAM/ a lap+si/ a lap+s+wa hi/ a lap+s+ma hi/ ra b+ha/ A rap+d+ha/ A rap+sA tAM/

A rap+sa ta/ ha da bshang ba 'dor ba la'o/ /sgra med pa rnams la shiT ma yin pa rnams kyi dang po'o zhes pas da yig gi ta yig go/ /a hat+ta/ a hat+sA tAM/ ahat+sa ta/ swa ki rgyun chags pa'i byings te 'gro ba'i don la'o/ /a swaMk+ta/ a swaM kA tAM/ a swaM ka ta/ ra ma/ ma na dag gi d+huT la

rjes su nga ro'o zhes pas ma yig gi rjes su nga ro'o/ /a raM sta/ a raM sA tAM/ a raM sa ta/ bya raM sIta/ A raM sIta/ par+Ya raM sIta/ ma na shes pa la'o/ /a maM sta/ a maM sA tAM/ a maM sa ta/ ya dza/ d+huT las kyang d+huT la'o zhes pas si tsa dbyi'o/ /b+h+r-i dza sogs nyid kyi phyir Sha'o/ /a yAk+ShIta/

a yASh+TAM/ a yAk+ShuH/ a yAk+ShIH/ a yASh+TaM/ a yASh+Ta/ a yAk+ShaM/ a yA k+Shu/ a yAk+Sh+ma/ a yaSh+Ta/ a yak+ShA tAM/ a yak+Sha ta/ a yaSh+ThAH/ a yak+ShA thAM/ d+huT rnams kyi bzhi pa rnams la gsum pa'o zhes pas Sha'i Da'o/ /a yaD+D+h+waM/ a yak+kaShi/ a yak+Sh+wa hi/ a yak+Sh+ma hi/ Du pa tsaSha/ tsa sde

'dra ba'i yi ge ma yin pa la ki'o/ /a pAk+ShIta/ a pAk+tAM/ a pAk+ShuH/ a pak+ta/ a pak+ShA tAM/ a pa k+ShA ta/ ran+dza/ a rAM k+ShIta/ a rAM k+ShAM ta/ a rAM k+ShuH/ khyad par nA mi gzung ba rjes su 'jug ste/ nA mi smos pa nyid kyis/ si tsa A shISha dag la'ang At+ma ne la'o zhes pas yon tan med pa nyid la a

nu ShaM ga dbyi ba med do/ /a raM k+ta/ a raM k+ShA tAM/ a raM k+Sha ta/ sha pa/ a shAp+sIta/ a shAp+tAM/ a shAp+suH/ a shap+ta/ a shA bA tAM/ a shab+sa ta/ Du ba pa/ a bA p+sIta/ a bAp+tAM/ a bAp+suH/ a bap+ta/ a bap+sA tAM/ a bap+sa te/ Na ha na hi'i d+hi'o zhes pas d+huT la ha yig gi d+ha yig go/ /

sgra med pa rnams la shiT ma yin pa rnams kyi dang po'o zhes pas d+ha'i ta'o/ /a nAt+sI ta/ ta tha dag gi d+ha'o/ /a nA d+d+hAM/ a nAt+suH/ a nad+d+ha/ a nat+sA tAM/ a na t+sa ta/ a na d+d+hAMH/ ba ha ha'i D+ha'o zhes pas d+huT la ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /Sha D+ha dag gi sa la ka'o/ /a bAk+ShI ta/ ta tha

dag gi d+ha'o/ /Sha dang Ta sde las ta sde'i Ta sde'o/ /sa hi ba ha dag gi a yig gi ota'o zhes pas D+ha la D+ha'i dbyi ste snga ma'i a yig gi o nyid do/ a bo D+ha/ /a bak+ShA tAM/ a bak+Sha ta/ ba da gsal bar brjod pa la'o/ /si tsa'o/ /iT A ga ma'o/ /ba dang bra dza ra

la mtha' rnams kyi'ang ngo zhes pas pa rasmai'i tshig pha rol la a yig gi ring po'o/ /a bA dIta/ a ba diSh+TAM/ a bA di ShuH/ bra dza 'gro ba la'o/ /a brA dzIta/ tsa ra 'gro ba'i don la'o/ /A tsA rIta/ uta las las dang bcas pa'i tsa ra zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /

u da tsa riSh+Ta kurum+baM/ dz+wa ra/ a dz+wA rIta/ tsa la/ a tsA lIta/ a tsA liSh+TAM/ a tswa li ShuH/ dz+wa la/ a dz+wA lIta/ da la rnam par 'joms pa la'o/ /a dA lIta/ ba b+h+ra 'gro ba'i don la'o/ /shwal+la myur du 'gro ba la'o/ /a yig ma yin pa'i ra la mtha'i zhes pas ring po med do/ /gang

a'i u pa d+hA zhes pa de 'jug go/ /a ba b+h+rIta/ a shwal+lA ti/ pa Tha/ gsal byed dang po iT dang bcas pa rnams kyi ni/ eta rjes su 'brel pa dang ha dang ma dang ya'i mtha' dang k+Sha Na dang shwa sa ma yin pa rnams kyi yang na'o zhes pas u pa d+hA'i a yig gi pa rasmai'i tshig pha rol

la yang na ring po'o/ /a bA thIta/ a pa thIta/ a pA thiSh+TAM/ a pA thi ShuH/ a pa thi ShuH/ ga da/ a gA dI ta/ a gA dIta/ Na da/ a nA dI ta/ a nI dIta/ a na/ ba Na/ b+ha Na/ ma Na/ ra Na zhes pa la sogs pas rgyun chags par bklags so/ /a rA NI ta/ a ra NAta/ a b+ha NIta/ a b+ha

NIta/ swa na sgra la'o/ /a swA nI ta/ a swa nIta/ bi las swa na 'i zas la'o zhes pas Sha nyid do/ /bya Sh+wa NIta/ bya Sh+wa NIta/ a bA Sh+rA NIta/ a bA Sh+wa NI ta/ eta rjes su 'brel pa rnams kyi iT dang bcas pa'i ma yin te/ ha se/ a ha sIta/ ka khed rgod pa la'o/ /a ka khIta la ge chags pa

la'o/ /a la gIta/ s+tha ge kun nas sgrib pa la'o/ /a s+tha gIta/ ma the srub pa la'o/ /a ma thIta/ tsa ha yongs su rnyog pa la'o/ /a tsa hIta/ ra ha gtong ba la'o/ /a ra hIta/ ma ha mchod pa la'o/ /a ma hIta/ gra ha/ gra hi las pa rok+ShU min pa la iTa'i ring po'o zhes pas iTa'i ring

po'o/ /de'i gnas can bzhin 'gyur ba'i phyir iTa'i bya ba'o/ /a gra hI ta/ a gra hISh+TAM/ a gra hI ShuH/ At+ma ne la/ a gra hISh+ThA/ a gra hIShA tAM/ a gra hI Sha ta/ a gra hISh+ThAH/ a gra hI ShA thAM/ de la byings las zhes pas/ ming sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa'i don no/ /des na as+su

iT dang bcas pa shin tu rnam par bshad pa grub pa rnams ha ya bar la'i yi ge rnams las kyang a su iT dang bcas pa shin tu rnam par bshad pa nyid mi rtag pa nyid kyis mtshon nas bkag go zhes pas yang na d+ha yig gi D+ha yig go/ /a gra hI D+h+waM/ a gra hId+h+waM/ s+ya mu sgra la'o/ /a s+ya mI ta/ a

s+ya miSh+TAM/ a s+ya mi ShuH/ dra ma 'gro ba la'o/ /a dra mIta/ Du ba ma/ a ba mIta/ kra mu/ snu/ kra mi dag las pa rasmai la'o zhes pas iTa'o/ /a kra mIta/ pra u pa dag las brtsams pa zhes pas ru tsa sogs nyid kyi phyir At+ma ne'i tshig la snu kra mi dag las pa rasmai'i yul nyid la zhes pa'i

nges pa las iT med do/ /prA krAM sta/ prA kraM sA tAM/ prA kraM sa ta/ u pA kraMsta/ u pA kraM sA tAM/ u pA kraM sa ta/ ha ya 'gro ba la'o/ /iT A ga ma'o/ /a ha yIta/ k+Sha na ta ma sogs rnams su bsngags pa la blta bar bya'o/ /shwa sA/ a shwa sIta/ bya tsa/ kuT sogs nyid kyi phyir si tsa'i
